We hope the above sections paint a clear picture of all the accomplishments our team has achieved over the past 6 weeks, meeting or exceeding all the engagement goals we set for ourselves in Prop 101. 

The Purpose of this Proposal is to ask the DAO to fund our proven team for an additional 5 months, until the end of the calendar year, to do the following:

* **Continue to plan and execute daily Twitter Spaces**: Engage newcomers, Nouners and Nouns community members alike, with informative guests and fun contests that produce a plethora of Nouns-based art and authentic social media engagement.
* **Continue to organize Contests for our community**: Using data from our trial, we have found that 1-2 weekly contests with larger prizes are both more effective and less administratively onerous compared to daily contests. We would plan to move forward with 1-2 contests per week with prizes ranging from 0.05-1ETH, which will no doubt encourage more thoughtful and skillful entries (while also peppering in smaller contests live on the show for variety.)  
* **Innovate on contest voting and prize administration:** We have spoken with Nounder Seneca and, if funded, plan to move forward with an implementation of **Prop House** for our contest entries to be voted on weekly, as an alternative to the current system of emoji voting in Discord. 
* **Work with the [Noun O'Clock Web App](https://prop.house/proposal/777) team:** Iterate with the team to ship a product with product-market fit and integrate these clients with our own site and daily Spaces as much as possible. 

### Areas of Focus

Our vision for TNS in the next 5 months:

* **International growth:** As we enter a European/APAC friendly Noun O Clock, we want to seize the opportunity to introduce Nouns to these regions of the world even more than we already have been.
* **Be a leading onboarding funnel to Nouns:** We have seen initial signs that our show is a great vehicle to onboard artists, builders, and future Nouners to the DAO. We want to lean into this and make sure our show becomes a strong funnel into nouns.
* **Expand to new channels:** We want to explore growth opportunities via new channels like podcast platforms, Youtube, TikTok and Twitch.
* **The Noun Square as a platform for builders:** We want to keep attracting talent to build on top of our show. Two teams ([NOC nouns client](https://prop.house/proposal/777) & [NOC Onboarding Materials](https://prop.house/proposal/864)) have already won prop house funding to build specifically on top of the Noun Square show, in addition to the previously mentioned artists whose collections have been prompted by our contests, and we hope to see more in the coming months.

### So what does success look like at the end of 2022?
* Grow our twitter followers from 1,600 to 5,000+
* Average daily attendance by end of year 200+
* 5,000+ contest entries
* International growth: Our goal is to contribute to growing a much larger international noun ecosystem by end of year. We have already started this outreach and plan to continue with more foreign language "takeover" spaces on the weekends, and focus on non-English accessibility in Discord and Twitter.  


### Budget

Monthly Operations Costs: 
* **Contest Prizes:** 10 ETH
* **Team Compensation and Administration:** 50 ETH per month, allocated by Committee Coordinape on a Biweekly basis.
* **Time Period:** 5 months until end of 2022. 
* 5 x 60 ETH = 300 ETH
**Total Proposal Ask: 300 ETH**
(Cost of 3 Daily Nouns Auctions for 5 months of daily Nounish multimedia content and organic social media engagement.) 


### Team

We will continue with our "3C Model" of governance and accountability:

**Core (Founding) Team (Responsible for Execution):**

Toady Hawk
Noun 142
Ser Noadz

**Council (Responsible for Decisions and Daily Direction)**

Aubtoshi
Benbodhi
SuperTightWoody
RyanMac21
!Xargs
Sam Ellis
Maty.eth
Joshua Fisher


*Members of this committee may rotate depending on timezones, availability, etc. New incoming Committee members from APAC timezones will most probably include 0xigami, Goldy, Mr. Boney, Mintfaced, and more.*

### Community (Talent Funnel for Council)

Anyone in our [Discord](https://discord.gg/VQxv2BFw39) and Twitter communities can join and participate in all our public channels to help with contest ideas, guest ideas, and more, and can apply to join the Organizing Committee at any time. We have forked Nouncil governance with procedures for adding/removing contributing committee members at any time. 

The above organizational strategy (modeled loosely on Nouncil) allows us enough structure to execute on a daily basis, as well as enough flexibility to adapt to new timezones and other challenges as they may arise.


## Strategy for North American "Nouns Winter"

NOC happening during North American late night/early morning may have some impact on our attendance rate, although we have been attracting a sizable audience from Europe and Asia already (for example, during our recent 24H long Nouniversary Spaces, attendance never dropped below 100 even during NA non-peak hours.) Nonetheless, we think of this as an opportunity rather than a challenge: 

### Proliferation opportunity
* Auction times drifting enable fairer distribution of nouns across the globe. **We think of our show drifting with NOC as giving a fairer opportunity for Noun proliferation outside of the Americas timezones**
*  We will have the opportunity to **engage with international guests**, and introduce our nounish energy to a new audience. 

### Host Recruiting & Scaling Ops

* **We have begun recruiting additional hosts** and administrative helpers from Europe and APAC timezones so that we can smoothly transition into North American night.
* Several of our Committee members are also excited to continue hosting/attending the show well into the North American night. 
* We are **already pulling in an impressive daily audience from Europe, Australia and Asia** (especially Japan and Korea.) 
* We plan to work with members of NounsDAOJapan, NounsDAO Brazil and GnarsDAO (Australia based) to continue to pull in new viewers and new Nounsfolk even through the North American early morning hours.



### New distribution channels

* We will begin posting recordings of our daily spaces both on a **podcast server and on Youtube**, so that North American audiences will still be able to listen and interact with our content daily. 
* We will also experiment with doing trial versions of The Noun Square on **Youtube, Twitch, and TikTok Live** to test engagement on those mediums. 

### Scaling with systems
* Our team has created a robust Notion for knowledge management with **Planning Documents, Tracking Databases and Daily Run-of-Show Templates** to enable onboarding of new hosts and contributors as easy and decentralized as possible.


## LFG!

We were funded for a trial and have surpassed all goals and metrics by a large margin, going above and beyond with initiatives such as the 24 hour Nouniversary Spaces. 

We represent a group of committed Nounish builders with a good track record of success, and we are asking for the DAO's trust, as we lean into a very successful concept and continue to improve, grow and scale this new platform centred around the daily Noun O' Clock. 

We believe that in a short time, The Noun Square has become the defacto watercooler of the Nounish ecosystem, as well as an impressive funnel for new Noun owners, artists and builders. 

We are excited by how much more we can do if given a mandate to keep on building throughout the remainder of 2022. 

**Thank you for your support, and we look forward to having you as a guest on the show one day soon!**

title: Nounify New York Fashion Week
description:
# Nounify New York Fashion Week

![NOUNS1234.png](https://polished-walrus-b42.notion.site/image/https%3A%2F%2Fs3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com%2Fsecure.notion-static.com%2Fa049a25e-253b-45f9-bb78-e973b8065703%2FNOUNS1234.png?table=block&id=bbedeb12-c914-4bf8-9218-8c3078a11340&spaceId=aaa84961-448d-41f3-9787-b37867da72d8&width=2000&userId=&cache=v2)

*This is 0xBobatea, I'm submitting this proposal on behalf of my friends at Advisry:

We want to Nounify New York Fashion week! By branding and collaborating on Advisry’s official calendar runway show in September, we will introduce nouns to fashion in an illustrious way.

**Why?**

Nouns has effortlessly aligned itself with all realms of high art. As a young fashion label, we are aware of the shift in culture and believe the Nouns Glasses logo is the Nike swoosh of web3. We feel it is necessary for Nouns to be represented in the most iconic facet of fashion culture, the fashion runway show.

**Nouns x Advisry Experience**

What Nouns is working towards in the future of web3 aligns closely with the overall goals of Advisry. Advisry and Nouns both strive to build communities to give individuals a voice and platform to express themselves and their ideas on a bigger scale. 

The Advisry X Nouns experience involves “In Real Life” events that bring our conglomerates together to communicate the importance of unity and change. Advisry wants to involve web3 in fashion and continue aligning with Nouns on potential future projects. 

**How**

To Nounify the show and after party, we will:

- Provide Advisry X Nouns POAPs to onboard show guests.
- Provide Nouns gifts for every show guest.
- Brand Nouns EVERYWHERE at the venue for the show and after party.
- Include Nouns pieces & looks designed by Keith Herron on the runway.
- Film a documentary of the process of Nounifying NYFW.

**The Show**

In September Advisry will be showing their first womenswear collection at New York Fashion Week. The collection titled, “Masculin Feminin” aims to capture gender inclusivity through 32 looks of traditional and nontraditional womenswear. 

**Nouns On The Runway**

Advisry will include Nouns Sunglasses that will be featured in one of the looks in the runway show. Along with this, one of the models will graze the runway with the Nouns Soft Trunk. There will be two Nouns-themed looks in the show.

![nouns soft trunk.png](https://polished-walrus-b42.notion.site/image/https%3A%2F%2Fs3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com%2Fsecure.notion-static.com%2F3f9c2296-0f88-4cad-9653-e37319381ee3%2Fnouns_soft_trunk.png?table=block&id=30217e74-922a-4901-9f78-9c2fe4257837&spaceId=aaa84961-448d-41f3-9787-b37867da72d8&width=2000&userId=&cache=v2)

**THE NOUNS SOFT TRUNK**

The soft trunk design is a reference and ode to custom Goyard and Gucci trunks made for their premier clients. They Screenprint their client’s names and or logos on the baggage to make them custom. The more thoughtful side of the design is the altering of the trunk itself - changing it from wooden frame structure to a more soft leather structure, similar to a luxury duffle. This trunk design is intended to be immediately iconic due to the pure crossover of a nouns logo with Advisry’s monogram print.

- A classical trunk shape & hardware, but no wooden frame - it will be made of vegan leather with gold plated .925 silver hardware - structured so it will maintain shape
- The classic Advisry checkerboard monogram will be embossed into the leather - the nouns glasses will be screenprinted on the bag
- Made in Italy

**Venue**

The show will take place in the *Oculus NYC*, an artistic landmark located at The World Trade Center. We will be the first of many fashion brands to utilize this as a show space, which is on its way to becoming one of the new homes of New York Fashion Week.

The Oculus NYC is located in one of the most heavily foot trafficked areas in all of New York. The building is packed with many storefronts, an NJTransit & major MTA station hub, and was once even home to a Kanye West music video in 2019.  

![Untitled](https://polished-walrus-b42.notion.site/image/https%3A%2F%2Fs3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com%2Fsecure.notion-static.com%2Fce2080fd-6ae6-4d01-b027-ba4995832001%2FUntitled.png?table=block&id=d57f7ed1-c590-4088-8e11-a62f04b37034&spaceId=aaa84961-448d-41f3-9787-b37867da72d8&width=1460&userId=&cache=v2)

![Untitled](https://polished-walrus-b42.notion.site/image/https%3A%2F%2Fs3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com%2Fsecure.notion-static.com%2Fd498554e-5c90-4cc2-a6cd-142be2f2c8ae%2FUntitled.png?table=block&id=6aa96ec1-ce6d-4561-ae46-a754bac567bb&spaceId=aaa84961-448d-41f3-9787-b37867da72d8&width=2000&userId=&cache=v2)

**Set Production**

- Dress the runway with Parisian style cafe chairs and tables where guests will be seated
- Light the show with Parisian style street lamps that are manually operated to highlight models by turning on and off as they walk the runway

**Proposal**

**Fund Advisry to:**

- Occupy the Oculus NYC space for the show and after party
- Produce all garments and accessories for the show
- Execute the set design of the show
- Create collaborative pieces to seed and sell to Nouns new and growing audience of luxury consumers
- Build out a team to produce, fabricate, style, cast, and model the *Masculin Feminin* Show
- Brand Nouns throughout the venue using Vinyl, Signage, Video, and more

**Branding**.

- Nouns X Advisry T-shirt collaboration to be gifted and/or sold at the after party
- Nouns branded drinks at the after party
- Nouns signage and video being played throughout the venue
- Nouns branding on all invites and Ads posted by Advisry

**Billboard: a 60’ x 12’ Nouns billboard placed outside of the Oculus, designed by Advisry’s creative director, Keith Herron. This billboard will reach beyond our fashion week audience and be seen by the heavy traffic of tourists and locals walking through the historic Oculus Space.**  

According to the City of New York data last updated on June 30 2022, the Oculus has an average foot traffic of 16,000 people per day

**Documentation**

We want to create a documentary that captures behind the scenes footage of the Nounification of New York Fashion Week! 

Telling the story of how an IRL fashion show can be realized with a Nouns collaboration speaks to how valuable, versatile, and functional the DAO is. The documentary would be the first of its kind and a timeless piece in a world where web3 and the high arts will one day seamlessly grow and work together. 

We would work to publish this documentary on a fashion youtube channel like Vogue, GQ, Etc. 

*We are interested in working with the creators of **Prop 73, Stoopid Buddy Doc** to film and produce the documentary but have not yet been in contact with them.* 

**How does this benefit Nouns**

New York Fashion Week is one of the most iconic and respected events in the global fashion industry. By working side by side we will transform the view of Nouns as not only having a “luxury” side of the brand with sunglasses and high quality garments, but also having a leg in the always changing industry of fashion.

Nouns holders in NYC will have the opportunity to place their name on our guest list for the runway show and all after parties using an alias to keep identities private.

A multi-faceted branding opportunity that not only reaches the show audience but also the city of New York

**Visibility**

With past coverage from Vogue, GQ, Forbes, WWD, CFDA, and more we believe we can bring Nouns to the forefront of fashion journalism. 

These platforms will put Nouns on hundreds of thousands of peoples radar if not more. Vogue, GQ, and WWD alone average over 5 to 10 million monthly website viewers and have a combined following of over 100 million people on all of their social media platforms.

**Why work with Advisry?**

Advisry is a fashion, film, and music label based in NYC. Keith Herron, 22 year old founder and designer, began Advisry when he was in 8th grade and has been growing the brand ever since. Keith has sold Advisry to 35 different countries, was awarded the Gucci Changemakers scholarship and was most recently added to the Designer’s Hub of CFDA: a members-only incubator of American Designers joining the likes of Marc Jacobs, Rick Owens, Virgil Abloh, and many more.

Last spring Advisry debuted on the runway at NYFW. In his first live show, Keith designed 37 looks and packed out the venue with over 150 people in attendance. 

The fashion industry is very gate kept. There is no actual way to break through the industry in an official way without working with a brand that has already broken through. Historically, the way brands get the opportunity to be on the official fashion calendar is by spending many seasons producing their own runway shows independent of the fashion calendar, hoping to gain the attention of the CFDA. 

The benefit of collaborating with Advisry is it gives Nouns an authentic introduction and inclusion into the fashion industry. Not only is Advisry an up and coming line making a lot of noise for its unique approach, but the brand has also collaborated on web3 drops in the past. Keith was the designer of the Advisry X CreatureWorld clothing collection, one of the most successful physical web3 drops to date. 

**Collaborators**  

- **Jean-Michel Basquiat Collaboration**

Advisry and [The Estate of Jean-Michel Basqiuat](https://www.basquiat.com/) are collaborating on 10 different pieces that will be debuted on the Advisry runway and be shown later on in the month at the Basqiuat museum. This is among the first collaborations ever that the family of Jean-Michel personally handpicked and approved. The pieces are the first of their kind to utilize never before seen artworks by Jean-Michel.

The fashion show will be closed with three Jean-Michel Basquiat collaboration looks as [Lolo Zouai](https://instagram.com/lolozouai?igshid=YmMyMTA2M2Y=) and the orchestra play a cover performance of Tu M’as Trop Ment. 

- **Adidas Collaboration**

Advisry and Adidas are collaborating on a shoe silhouette designed by Keith Herron that will be featured on many looks throughout the runway show. The shoes will be constructed by hand in New York City

- **NOUNS Collaboration**

Featured as one of few collaborations in the fashion show alongside **Adidas** and **Basquiat,** with a trunk designed by Keith Herron alongside highlighting the physical glasses on the models. The Nouns collaboration completes the trio - highlighting fine art, heritage footwear, and the future of intellectual property.

**Budget**

*All production costs of the show will be split with Advisry evenly*

Nouns collaboration production: **$25,500**

- Nouns x Advisry Soft Trunks: $1,500
- Nouns Branding: $10,000
- Clothing Production: $14,000

Venue: **$11,500**

- Rental Price: $10,000
- Insurance: $1,500

Set Design: **$10,000**

- Cafe table and chair rentals: $5,000
- Parisian style street lamps: $2,000
- Audio: $2,000
- Lighting: $1,000

Team: **$5,000**

- Producer: $2,000
- Stylist: $1,000
- Show runner: $500
- Models: $1,500

**Total: ~$52,000**

***33 ETH***

title: Nouns Almanac Second Edition
description:
# Nouns Almanac Second Edition

## TL;DR:
**The Nouns Almanac Second Edition book development extends the Nouns featured in the First Edition by another 256 Nouns, showcasing a total of 512 Nouns minted in 2021/2022.**

---

**Project: Nouns Almanac Second Edition
Onchain Sponsor: [@Benbodhi](https://twitter.com/benbodhi) (Nouncillor)
Funding: 18.5 Ξ
Ship date: Dec 10th 2022** *(in time for Christmas shopping for kids presents)*

---
![](https://i.imgur.com/g7nzGhV.jpg)

# What Is Nouns Almanac Second Edition

The Nouns Almanac Second Edition is a physical book featuring Nouns 257 - 512, following the First Edition that featured Nouns 0 - 256. Each Noun receives a full page feature including unique traits, commentary and buyer details as at the publication date.

![](https://i.imgur.com/gx7DVXJ.jpg)

The Nouns Almanac is a series of four reference guide books documenting the first 1,024 Nouns ever born over a 36 month period. 

**Publication Dates**
Nouns Almanac 1st Edition: May 16th 2022
Nouns Almanac 2st Edition: December 10th 2022

**Nouns Featured**
Nouns Almanac 1st Edition: 0 - 256 *complete and published May 16th 2022*
Nouns Almanac 2nd Edition: 257 - 513 **Proposal Delivery Dec 10th 2022**
Nouns Almanac 3rd Edition: 514 - 770 *planned H1 2023*
Nouns Almanac 4th Edition: 771 - 1,024 *planned H2 2023*

# Success To Date
Created a metaverse native 'walkbook' of the Nouns Almanac where Noun curious people can walk through the first 30 pages, launching on the Nouniversary 8/8.
[Experience Nouns Almanac walkbook](https://https://twitter.com/mintfaced/status/1555696685665628161?s=20&t=ZVimXlwL2Ad8Z0kZi-7_Rw)

![](https://i.imgur.com/ymkLhnb.jpg)

Orders for the Nouns Almanac First Edition are received through the Amazon marketplace at a run rate 20-25 books per month without active marketing promotion. Most book sales are expected in the Christmas period.

The Nouns Almanac First Edition ranked #1 in children’s cartoon books and #2 in Digital Art books on launch. A month later the Nouns Almanac ranked in the Top 250 books in both categories. 

The Nouns Almanac First Edition has been purchased by a number of the Noun community with some of the positive comments including:

“The Nouns Almanac is getting some serious use this summer, the kids are wild for it.” @BTCBob100k

“Excellent quality ser” @exlawyer.eth

“Looks good in print” @NounsTown
 
“Look ma, I’m in a coffee table book!” @gabrielayuso

![](https://i.imgur.com/NQGMXGE.jpg)

![](https://i.imgur.com/8a8TTMI.jpg)

![](https://i.imgur.com/C6qFykN.jpg)

---

# Book Package
The book package is to fund a finished book that will be completed by MintFace’s publishing company UmPrint Publishing. Key points:

1. The success of this proposal does not require a separate publisher to approve or distribute. 
2. No additional funding is required to bring the book to market.

![](https://i.imgur.com/m8e0tky.png)
Activities included as part of the project are to write the chapters, develop and complete the book design layout and expand the content to included more Noun Extension projects beyond what was delivered in the Nouns Almanac First Edition. 

The package includes four key deliverables:
1. A finished manuscript
2. A completed final book layout of the full book (approx 320 pages)
3. Feature articles written in consultation with Noun Extension Communities
4. Cover art (draft shown below)

# Cover Art
All Nouns numbered 257 - 512 will be featured on the front cover.
![](https://i.imgur.com/942QwA1.jpg)

# Project Activities
* Data extraction from OpenSea owners, date minted and Noun number
* Document traits minted 257 - 512 and add to First Edition trait database
* Updated Nouns Zone front end website [www.nouns.zone](https://) with mint data
* Write Nouns extension chapter featuring notable extension projects
* Copy editing to ensure language in the manuscript follows the rules of standard English and adheres to a Nounish style
* Proof reading to review for clarity and readability as well as flow, grammar, word usage, spelling, and punctuation
* Create book layout for Nouns Almanac Second Edition

# Completion Date
The priority is to have the book published and available from Amazon by December 10th 2022 in time for purchasing for Christmas gifts.

# Key Milestones
* Aug 25th - Sep 1st: Data extraction, document traits, update Nouns Zone website. 
* Sep 1st - Sep 30th: Consult with Nouns extension projects and write up features. 
* Sep 30th - Oct 30th: Book layout and design. 
* Oct 30th - Nov 30th: Proof reading and editing. 
* Nov 30th - Dec 10th: Nouns Almanac Second Edition launch window.

# Nouns Almanac 2nd Edition Funding
MintFace team article writing, design and layout 15 Ξ
Data extraction, documenting traits 2 Ξ
Proof readers 1.5 Ξ
**Total Funds Requested: 18.5 eth**

Wallet to receive funds: nounbook.eth 0xC185d966F64480BEDb2ED458E7d1A1e29d95231C

The Nouns Almanac First Edition book is already proliferating Nouns through the Amazon global distribution network. Lets keep the momentum by releasing the Nouns Almanac Second Edition.

# About Me
Serial creatoooor. I recently published ‘Minted’ Artists on the blockchain book and also founded the Digital Artist Economy workshop onboarding the next 2,000 artists into NFTs, through the A16Z funded invite only Maven platform. I write about artists who mint on [mintface.xyz](https://www.mintface.xyz).

Contact MintFace on Twitter: [@mintfaced](https://twitter.com/mintfaced)

![](https://i.imgur.com/XUXnSGD.jpg)
*Minted book featuring 100 artists (left). MintFace aka Cryptophunk 457 (right)*

I am also the creator of MintFace, curator for Punk6529 galleries, and have a number of digital properties for the Open Metaverse (om) including the Nouns District under development.
![](https://i.imgur.com/m0e2iA1.png)

I have published a number of business books prior to NFTs, held senior leadership roles in tech orgs in New Zealand and the UK and now enjoy working on cutting edge projects where tech, education and art intersect. My claim to fame, is I started selling MP3 players three years before Steve Jobs invented the iPod!

Thank you in advance for considering this proposal!

Ryan aka MintFace
[@mintfaced](https://twitter.com/mintfaced)
[mintface.xyz](https://www.mintface.xyz)

title: Nouns Animated Short Film with Los Angeles Red Carpet Premiere
description:
# Nouns Animated Short Film with Los Angeles Red Carpet Premiere

My name is Fedja, and I’m a Montenegrin recent USC graduate, writer, and filmmaker. I was introduced to Nouns by Euwyn (Noun #122 and #341), and fell enamored with the sense of community I’ve observed so far. Nounish-ness is special, and I’d love to bottle up a bit of this and spread the word about Nouns to larger audience.

This proposal is for a community-driven, studio-quality animated short film starring a Noun, with a red carpet event in Los Angeles to cap off production and bring Nouns and film community members together to inspire more collaborations.

With an origin story of falling out of their owner’s laptop - think “Finding Nemo” - the protagonist Noun will be animated in stop-motion style, composited on real footage, and film their own journey home. With the Nouns community involvement at each step, the story will be written to be captivating to a broad international audience across different languages, crypto-native and not. 

## Why?

Allow us to introduce you to: The Noun. An animated Noun, fallen out of his owner’s laptop and finding himself lost in the real world. Starting with an animated short, audiences worldwide will watch the charming, adorable, and sneakily snarky Noun overcome obstacles, find and lose love, and much more as he films his journey home. Modernizing the mold of fictional personalities like Marcel the Shell with Shoes On, or Annoying Orange, and inspired by early Pixar shorts, we aim to make the Noun into a well-loved, viral, memeable, sharable character. 

A big part of our effort will be involving the community in writing a unique, compelling narrative for the noun. As a storyteller, this is where I’ll be focused. The intimacy of telling his story from his POV, with his phone camera, intercut with 3rd-person footage of his adventures, will build a lasting emotional relationship with his audience that will transfer into future projects, from this team and others. Whether it be longer YouTube videos, a TV series, or even his own feature film, people will follow the Noun wherever he goes — in the world or online.

His story will be designed to be saturated with clipable, memeable, shareable moments that don’t need context to go viral on their own. However, for the curious viewer, the clips bring them in to a larger narrative designed and produced around a genuine story and loveable protagonist.

## Community-Driven Production

Ultimately, we want the character, and the project as a whole, to be completely emblematic of all that is Nounish. Yes, this means quirkiness, humor, personality and spontaneity, but it also means myriad factors and traits we can’t even begin to predict. This is why throughout the entire creative process we will hold bi-weekly town halls to discuss the script and invite members to share their thoughts. The character bio, the general plot, the finished screenplay, design, locations, all of it. We promise to be receptive to feedback, and additionally will host community feedback sessions to ensure our protagonist is as Nounish as can be.

Along the Noun’s journey, he will inevitably interact with other characters and Nouns in the wild, and while the Noun overcomes loneliness, fear, and anxiety, the story will lead towards an ultimate message of the value of community and collective voice. This will open an opportunity for more creatives to build and expand upon what would effectively become the Nouns Cinematic Universe. Other writers, animators, directors, with their own backgrounds, aesthetic styles, and manners of storytelling, can build upon the framework Noun sets and expand with their own real-world Noun characters and stories.

We’re not only creating a viral character who will bring attention to the Nouns project, but a platform upon which like-minded creatives can find opportunities to build art.

## Development


### Pre-Production

6-8 weeks

- Writing
- Location scouting
- Establishing workflow for animation
- Voice actor casting
- The casting will likely be the longest part of pre-production. In building a project based around the personality of one protagonist, the casting is crucial. We do it once, we do it right.

### Production

6-8 weeks

- Filming
- Recording voice lines
- Animation

### Post-Production

1-2 weeks

- Hiring social media marketing specialist to maximize likelihood of going viral
- Setting up digital marketing strategy (trending hashtags, etc)
- Deploying the videos

![Budget Breakdown](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/2X/e/e272bac8a1a6e48b90b3caa34452bb40323cbf8e.jpeg)


It is our goal to create a professional, polished, award-worthy product. As such, we’re going to need a professional team. Above is our outlined 25 ETH budget, covering a worst-case scenario which can promise a perfect result. We will strive to remain under that budget, however, and any remaining surplus will go towards the following, which we hope piques your interest.

## Los Angeles Red Carpet Premiere 

As the Noun character falls into the real world, so to do we wish to bring this to life. To cap off production, we will host a screening event in Los Angeles with a Nouns step and repeat banner, red carpet, and more, inviting members of the Nouns and film community. It’ll be an opportunity to meet the team behind the project, celebrate together, and provide another occasion for the Nouns community to gather and grow.

## The Team

Who are we!? We’re (mostly) recent graduates out of LA and Austin, Texas, trying to carve our way creatively. With backgrounds in literature, screenwriting, film production, animation, and design, we’re coming together to build something not only with catchy style, but with weighted substance. We don’t just want to work with Nouns to make *something* — we believe we can make something *great.*

**Fedja Celebic.**
Producer, Writer, Director

[Fedja](https://www.linkedin.com/in/fedja-celebic-853522199/) is a USC graduate with a degree that spanned all mediums of writing and a Masters in Literary Editing and Publishing, and has found his creative satisfaction in screenwriting and producing. With previous work in development with [Cinetic Media](https://cineticmedia.com) and consulting on a debut series with [WildcatterLA](https://wildcatterla.com), Fedja also has ample experience in filmmaking, having worked at [Port Media](https://ncmhub.org) for 6 years. He has various awards and shortlists for his [creative writing](https://pdfhost.io/v/8xOinycdI_Writing_Samples_for_Nouns).

**James Bristow.**
Lead Animator

[James](https://jamesbristow.me) graduated from the Radio, Television, and Film program of UT Austin, with an emphasis in animation. Some of his brilliant character animation can be seen on his online [portfolio](https://jamesbristow.me/animation). He is currently an Art Director with [Midnight Kids Studios](https://midkidstudios.com), and is the lead animator on Mars – an upcoming animated feature film by the Whitest Kids U’Know.

**Euwyn Poon.**
Executive Producer

[Euwyn](https://euwyn.com) (Noun #122 and #341) is the founder and CEO of Micro, a holding company that builds and invests in Web3. He is an avid NFT collector and was one of the founding members of PleasrDAO. He previously co-founded [Spin](https://www.spin.app), which launched scooter sharing in the US and was acquired by Ford. Among other efforts at Spin, he led the marketing and design teams created the [brand](https://character.co/work/spin) and [YouTube content](https://www.youtube.com/c/SpinScooters). He holds a computer science degree from Cornell University and a law degree from Cornell Law School, practicing at Simpson Thacher before moving to startups and getting funded by Y Combinator.

![Mockup One](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/2X/5/585b13da3adbe0e5606a2cc0cbf71d9d2c64e941.jpeg)

![Mockup Two](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/2X/f/f6a22b8887c1a99831b44b9129bed38cd4212333.jpeg)

Note: These are *very* rough concept sketches, scrapped together by the writer of the group. We guarantee a higher quality of animation with the finished product, promising on a realistically-rendered 3D character.

title: Nouns x Dopamine
description:
# Nouns x Dopamine

# Nouns x Dopamine

*tl:dr: Dopamine & Apenoun propose to collaborate on a Nounish “Non-Fungible Streetwear” drop to be premiered in a Nouns’ exhibition room at Dopamine’s Art Basel Miami launch party.*

*The drop will include ~500 cut-and-sew garments (including t-shirts, hoodies, and more) with cryptographic NFC microchips embedded under Nouns clothing patches, each connected via an on-chain ENS-like chip registry to a Nouns-branded NFT. A white-labeled Nouns browser app will be used for scanning the patch to claim the NFT, as well as for authenticating and verifying the garment owner and manufacturer.* 

*Dopamine, as the first Nouns-fork to incorporate with fashion, would like to include Nouns’ drop as one of a select few to incorporate Dopamine’s new web3 streetwear technology (”Non-Fungible Streetwear”). Nouns streetwear will be sold both at the event and online.*

*Funds requested are 62-82Ξ, with 85% of the primary sales revenue going to the Nouns treasury.*

![Noggles](https://i.imgur.com/6dxtUlx.jpg)

# Introduction

Dopamine is thrilled to collaborate with Apenoun to design a limited-supply Nouns-branded collection of NFT-bundled streetwear. The collection will feature ~500 Nouns streetwear garments, each of which will be patched with a cryptographic NFC chip connecting on-chain to a Nouns-branded NFT that can be authenticated and claimed through a white-labeled Nouns browser app. The branding and experience for this drop will be Nounish end-to-end, and will fully incorporate Dopamine’s new “Non-Fungible Streetwear” technology.

[Dopamine](http://dopamine.xyz/) is the first Nouns-fork to incorporate fashion, with the mission to empower Web3 projects, NFT artists, and collectors through a community-owned ecosystem for Non-Fungible Streetwear. We are crypto natives with a passion for streetwear culture and web3 technology, aiming to bridge the gap between these two worlds. 

Originally inspired by Nouns’ creative governance and community model, we want to become an incubator for up-and-coming streetwear designers and NFT artists and recreate the “Nouns Virtuous Cycle” for the budding web3 streetwear industry. 

With this collab we’re aiming to push the Nounish culture forward and proliferate the Nouns meme and brand across the Metaverse and into mainstream pop culture using a powerful vehicle for hype: streetwear.

# Designs

Dopamine will work closely with Apenoun to design the garments, which will feature the Noggles and the Nouns slogan “One Noun, Every day, Forever.” Around 500 pieces will be made in total, featuring a combination of t-shirts, hoodies, and various other apparel. Quality-wise, this drop will have a premium feel reminiscent of brands such as Fear of God or Acne Studios, leveraging entirely cut and sew assembly. In terms of past experience, Dopamine’s design team has worked with the likes of Billie Eilish, Young Thug’s Spider, and Siberia Hills. 

In addition to the merchandise design, each garment will feature a Nouns clothing patch covering the NFC chip used to connect to its bound Nouns NFT, which itself will include a digital 3D design of the garment along with additional digital accessories (see next section). Finally, the patch itself will also be capable of triggering an AR hologram of the underlying digital design.

![1](https://i.imgur.com/kLfrWi5.jpg)

![2](https://i.imgur.com/kJYBPNF.png)

![3](https://i.imgur.com/63NDcOM.jpg)

![4](https://i.imgur.com/9eqWRdI.jpg)

![5](https://i.imgur.com/FkUXpDq.jpg)

![6](https://i.imgur.com/Axt3asS.png)

![7](https://i.imgur.com/7sRU8u4.jpg)

We are continuing to iterate with Apenoun on additional designs while ensuring the entire drop remains cohesive.

![8](https://i.imgur.com/31n8Mwe.png)

![9](https://i.imgur.com/p8teGhg.png)

# Non-Fungible Streetwear Technology

Dopamine is creating a decentralized fashion technology platform for authenticating and sharing a new form of chip-microchipped streetwear that we call **“Non-Fungible Streetwear”**.

At the core of each Non-Fungible Streetwear piece is a **physical-bound NFT (PNFT)**, an NFT *forever bound* to the garment through an on-chain registry that uses chip-generated ECDSA signatures for resolution, whose media represents a 3D model of the physical streetwear piece. 

By scanning the garment’s patched chip with Dopamine’s white-labeled browser app, garment owners will be able to claim the PNFT, authenticate collection and manufacturer details, and view digital renditions of their streetwear in a 3D-like wardrobe. On top of this, PNFTs may be composed with arbitrary numbers of other digital assets, such as NFTs representing brand-related digital art, music, or perks. 

Below, we dive into more detail on the customization process, on-chain connectivity layer, and scanning flow as it relates to Nouns’ curated Non-Fungible Streetwear collection. 

### Customization Process

![wip10](https://i.imgur.com/gErPzVi.jpg)

The following assets will be required for the Nouns’ Non-Fungible Streetwear collection:

- **Nouns 3D PNFT Design**
The design file for the PNFT, which in this case will be a 3D digital rendition of the Nouns physical garment bundled as a GLTF file.
- **Nouns Accessory Media Files**
Additional digital media files may be provided to build accessory NFTs. These could be anything from Nouns Art Basel POAPs to complementary Nouns digital avatars. Unlike the PNFTs which are forever bound to their garments, these accessory NFTs may be attached and detached on-chain to allow for composability with any Non-Fungible Streetwear pieces.
- **Nouns PNFT Collection Specs**
Ownership attribution for the Nouns’ Non-Fungible Streetwear will revolve around a custom ERC721-compatible Nouns PNFT collection with a fixed supply of ~500, reflecting the total number of garments distributed. Besides the aforementioned accessorizing, additional specs may be added here, such as collection-wide metadata or whitelisting support.

### On-Chain Connectivity

![11](https://i.imgur.com/zs3fcSV.png)

Connection between Nouns streetwear garments to Nouns PNFTs will be entirely on-chain, and will involve three major components: 

**NFC Chip**

Dopamine NFC microchips are machine-washable ~30mm round, 1mm thick chips capable of signing messages. Scanning the patched chip will enable chip-signed attestations (secured at the firmware level) to be passed through the on-chain registry to the Nouns browser app for authentication and claiming.

**Chip Registry**

An ENS-like on-chain registry mapping chip ids to PNFTs will be used for connecting physical and digital worlds together in a truly decentralized manner. Included in each record will be a pre-registered IPFS cert provided by Nouns (e.g. an attestation signed by Nouns Deployer) and the chip manufacturer. 

**Nouns PNFTs**

Nouns PNFTs will act as the virtual representation and authentication interface for the Nouns’ streetwear garments. Unlike most NFTs, which are normally only owned by a user EOA, these will include two forms of ownership attribution - one involving the garment owner, and one involving the paired chip itself. 

### Browser App

The three above components allow the white-labeled Nouns browser app to process claims, verifications, and transfers in a way that is truly 100% decentralized. Below, we outline at a high-level how claims and normal scans work:

**Claims:**

![12](https://i.imgur.com/KLykF7M.png)

Dopamine's Non-Fungible Streetwear uses a physical-first standard for claiming. This means that recipients of the Nouns’ Non-Fungible Streetwear collection will first get the physical garment, and then scan the patched chip using the Nouns browser app shown above to have the ownership attribution of the PNFT assigned to them. For security reasons, only addresses of those which have purchased the collection pieces (either online or live at Art Basel) will be able to invoke the initial claim.

**Scans:**

![13](https://i.imgur.com/uWHAKW2.png)

Anyone with an NFC-enabled smart device will be able to tap their devices on the Nouns’ chip patches to view details regarding garment owner and authenticity through the Nouns browser app. In addition, these scans will showcase the PNFT media assets in an interactive 3D wardrobe-like environment, along with any bundled accessories.

## Dopamineland @ **Art Basel Miami**

The Nouns x Dopamine drop will feature at our Art Basel Miami multi-day event “Dopamineland” as part of a select group of 5 partners representing the best and the brightest of web3 culture and meme power. 

The Nouns area will be a fully Nouns-branded immersive experience featuring on-site “activations” giving users direct interaction with the Nouns bundles and their physical-digital features.

Nouns Non-Fungible Streetwear will be available for purchase on-site and online via credit card or ETH. For online orders, shipments will be handled through Shopify.

## Nouns x Dopamine Bundle Cost Breakdown

Supply: ~500 (TBD)

Costs: ~82Ξ 

Supply: ~500 (TBD)

Costs: ~62Ξ  - 82Ξ 

- Curation Fee (incl. Garment Design & Development, Smart Contract Development, 3D Model Design, NFT Design): ~2Ξ
- Garment Production Costs: ~20-25Ξ
- Microchip + embedding: ~5-10Ξ
- Authentication & AR Integration: ~10-15Ξ
- Packaging: ~10Ξ
- Shipping: ~10-15Ξ
- Operational costs: ~5Ξ

Funds will be converted to USDC upon transfer to avoid impact from ETH volatility. On project completion, any remaining ETH will be send back to the Nouns DAO treasury.

Primary Sales: 85% to Nouns DAO Treasury, 15% to Dopamine

Secondary Sales: 5% to Dopamine, Nouns to set secondary fee

## **Timeline**

- September: Design & Development
- October - November: Production
- December: Art Basel Dopamine Marketplace Launch

## **Team**

As mentioned the Dopamine team will work closely with Apenoun to deliver this drop and ensure Nounish branding and experience from start to finish.

![14](https://i.imgur.com/eBt6zGb.png)
![15](https://i.imgur.com/Oppo3rb.jpg)

![16](https://i.imgur.com/640yaEu.png)

title: SharkLabs -- A nounish incubator by SharkDAO
description:
# SharkLabs -- A nounish incubator by SharkDAO

![enter image description here](https://snapshot.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/bafybeigy7tbnqavbqmgyu4k2lfil5s25vtiuuptchaibfhez4s6vdntanq)

_Collectors piece for our charity “Sharkfrens”, by Messhup_

----------

**TLDR**

SharkDAO is requesting 99 ETH to fund Shark Labs, a Nounish incubator program designed to ship Nounish projects.

----------

# Introduction


As holders of 6 Nouns, Shark DAO members have created and pushed several proposals to Nouns over the past year, becoming an important and reliable contributor to the Nouns ecosystem. Additionally, some of the most active Nouns contributors got their start in SharkDAO.

Successful proposals:

-   Prop 8 - FOMO Nouns
-   Prop 12 - Perpetual Glasses to Kids In Need V2
-   Prop 20 - Nouns Stories
-   Prop 56 - FUN Noggles Stage 2
-   Prop 68 - Nouns Esports
-   Prop 70 - Nouns CC0 Story Foundations & Development
-   Prop 104 - Free Glasses for Kids v4
-   Prop 116 - Monthly Nouns Comic

The time has come to raise our contributor game to the next level by deploying Shark Labs, an open creative laboratory and incubator focused on supporting Nounish creatives in developing and submitting deliverables to Nouns on a regular basis, led by core SharkDAO contributors.

# What is Shark Labs?

Shark Labs is a cohort of SharkDAO contributors that are actively working to support, develop, and ship Nounish projects. SharkLabs will operate under 3 main outlets to achieve our goals:

-   **Art**
-   **Development**
-   **Media**

SharkDAO has a unique identity as a more accessible avenue for participation in the Nouns ecosystem. We attract many builders, artists, and creatives, with more to come as a result of our upcoming PFP project. The mission of Shark Labs is to implement a structure in which we can more efficiently utilize and support contributors in deploying projects that add value to Nouns with a regular cadence.

----------

![_15.png](https://snapshot.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/bafkreibexnxvx74cecnj2mgfwnl7zqg2x7trkxbpvxv3he3rcu3evcj4za)

_Excerpt from the Shark Street Comic #2, by Maty_

----------

# Outlet Details

-   **Art Reef:**  Art Reef: An art laboratory supporting emerging and established nounish creatives in addding content to Nouns lore and creating cc0 art for both SharkDAO & Nouns DAO. For this period, the Art Reef is interested in offering grants for projects that add background stories and personality to Nouns characters.
    
-   **Builders Bay:**  Advise and support the planning, development, and implementation of open source software projects that are focused on adding value to the SharkDAO/ NounsDAO ecosystem. For this funding period, the Development outlet will operate with an emphasis on attracting more builders to the Nouns ecosystem, funding and advising projects that seek to create efficiencies in coordination and collaboration amongst Sharks & Nouners, as well as tools that streamline processes for evaluating and awarding project grants and retroactive funding.
    
-   **Media Cove:**  Oversee the production of various media efforts designed to promote and educate those interested in the SharkDAO/ NounsDAO ecosystem, keep Sharks and Nouners informed about the latest initiatives, and perpetuate the Nounish culture through appropriate mediums. In this cycle, the Media Cove is focused on producing calculated 'outward facing' content that is designed to draw newcomers to the Nouns ecosystem.
    

# Operational Structure

-   If passed, the funds from this proposal will be equally split (33 ETH each) between the 3 outlets. For transparency and efficiency, 5 signers will be nominated to sit on a dedicated multisig.
-   Each outlet will be managed by a trusted SharkDAO contributor. The outlet managers will be responsible for keeping projects on track, providing updates to NounsDAO, and organizing the election of committee members and multi-sig signers.
    -   Art Reef — Marxistmillionaire
    -   Builders Bay — Nick Dodson
    -   Media Cove — Cryptasha
-   DAO members submit project ideas to the outlets for a committee of fellow contributors to deliberate and advise. Project funds are released following a review by the committee members.
    -   Committee members (subject to change)
        -   Chris Carella
        -   Cryptasha
        -   Marxistmillionaire
        -   Sasquatch
        -   Joshua Fisher
        -   Yungweez
        -   Nick Dodson
-   Bi-weekly Shark Labs updates will be posted in the Nouns discord.

# Expected Deliverables

While many deliverables will result from projects and ideas which will be surfaced as a result of Shark Labs, here is what Nouners can definitively expect to be shipped during this period.

-   **Art Reef**
    
    -   Shark Street Comic (issues #3 to #5)
        -   SharkDAO’s very own comic series, telling the backstories of our six Nouns. More details  [here](https://www.notion.so/The-Shark-Street-Comic-0efa96404f5d440b862383f0088131be).
        -   Budget: 15 ETH
    -   Shark Art Residency
        -   Incubator program for emerging artists, granting online residencies as an easy access into Shark DAO and the Nouns ecosystem. More details  [here](https://www.notion.so/The-Shark-Art-Residency-dc1aab1cdb26415d88bde191cb4f8326).
        -   Budget: 13 ETH
    -   Ancillary reserve:
        -   Budget: 5 ETH
-   **Builders Bay**
    
    -   Creator Contests
        -   Retroactive funding contests for contributors. More details  [here](https://www.notion.so/Creator-Contests-b68fc53bb8d549a4b4e7dbf8dd3e4c34).
        -   Budget: 18 ETH
    -   Shark Builders Residency
        -   Small grants program for Nounish devs and designers. More details  [here](https://www.notion.so/Builders-Residency-Program-ca1ce9d6d9484e5085ccc5dc1304bde9).
        -   Budget: 15 ETH
-   **Media Cove**
    
    -   Shark Tank
        -   Weekly twitter spaces, which will give updates on what's happening in SharkDAO, NounsDAO and invite guests from other DAO / CC0 communities to speak.
        -   Budget: 6 ETH
    -   SharkDAO Podcast
        -   Through various episodes and segments, SharkDAO will inform active members, proliferate the Nounish brand, and educate curious outsiders. We will operate with an emphasis on drawing new members to the Nouns ecosystem.
        -   Budget: 22 ETH
    -   Ancillary reserve:
        -   5 ETH
    
    More details about all current Media Cove projects  [here](https://www.notion.so/Media-Cove-7f69dbf6c3c64d5087730f2586418c46).
    

# Proposed Transactions

Transfer a total of 99 ETH to the Shark Lab multisig

-   Address: 0x6ED21E7284400e5E785aCF161DF05bd815f26C7e
-   Signers: Nick Dodson, Cryptasha, Marxistmillionaire, Sasquatch, Joshua Fisher

# What is Shark DAO?

-   A group of web3 enthusiasts that pooled together funds in order to participate in the Nouns ecosystem, proliferate Nouns culture, and ship web3 projects.
-   Founded in July 2021.
-   Currently holding 6 Nouns.
-   Consistent NounsDAO governance participants and proposal submitters.

# Find out more about us

Twitter —  [https://twitter.com/sharkdao](https://twitter.com/sharkdao)

Discord —  [https://discord.gg/xXByPBTrUe](https://discord.gg/xXByPBTrUe)

Snapshot —  [https://snapshot.org/#/sharkdao.eth](https://snapshot.org/#/sharkdao.eth)

----------

![enter image description here](https://snapshot.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/bafybeicw74qfcolooc2uvj2vn3qf7qvlp6aygmm2yjvsvwbq4ltachny7u)

_POAP for our “Shark-versary Spaces”, by Messhup_

title: Liberating Proposal Threshold for 26 years
description:
# Liberating Proposal Threshold for 26 years

Change the threshold to put a proposal on-chain from the current 2 votes to 1 vote.

Why:
- We are disenfranchising roughly 80% of noun holders currently.
- We are not seeing many proposals coming in.
- We want to empower any nouner or delegate to participate in the DAO.

Setting the proposal threshold to 1 would require 2 votes again once we passed 9999 nouns in roughly 26 years.

title: Xanadu x Nouns: Mega Episode + Real-time Nouns World Toolkit
description:
# Xanadu x Nouns: Mega Episode + Real-time Nouns World Toolkit

Dear NounsDAO,

Welcome to Xanadu… a story world made by one dude with godlike creation powers forging a new category of entertainment that twists fiction with reality and collides pop culture with the coolest things on the internet. It’s a wild, novel genre that’s inspiring a new generation of creators, artists, and storytellers. 

### Click image to watch Blu present the proposal
[![Image alt text](https://img.youtube.com/vi/ktZaS52qyYA/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ktZaS52qyYA) 

We’re a team of two with a shared passion for bringing avatars and worlds to life. We want to help bring Nouns into the 3D metaverse with our unique storytelling and world-building skills. We propose a XANADU x NOUNS collaboration consisting of two parts:

### Part One - Nouns Episode of Xanadu 
We would create a mega-episode of Xanadu where Blu, the hero of Xanadu, teams up with Nouns in an action-packed deep dive into the Nouns Universe.

The episode features Blu questing through Planet Nouns desperate for the Nouns help to save him from a posse of intergalactic gangsters. To satisfy the bounty on his head, Blu must submit a winning proposal to Nouns DAO which kicks off a wild escapade through the Nouns City Center, the historic Nouner Capitol building, and the Nouns Underground. Along the way, Blu meets a master Noun who gives him a crash course on NounsDAO, how it works and why it’s awesome — education disguised as Hollywood quality entertainment. But it doesn’t stop there…

![Alt Text](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/2X/e/e4951cf151fd7bfb2f983a7dbcb7ed901ce5614d.gif)

### Part Two - CC0 Nouns Toolkit
Unlike a Hollywood feature where all the creativity and work vanish after the movie’s made, all of the Nouns assets created for this episode will be crafted into a Nouns World Toolkit that will live on in an innovative and powerful new way — in the hands of the community, available CC0.
This is more than a simple library of assets…

Because Xanadu is built in a game engine (Unreal Engine 5), it’s a story world that can be cinematic, interactive, gamified, live-streamed, or experienced in VR. So, armed with this massive toolkit of AAA animatable Nouns characters & pre-lit, animated environments — complete with how-to guide books & tutorials created by us — the Nouns community can inhabit a Noun for VTubing, Zoom calls, or create cinematic content, marketing materials, NFTs, or even build a Nouns VR experience, game, or metaverse. It’s our hope for this to become the beginning of a dynamic Nouns repository that grows over time and is contributed to by other builders. (Full list of Toolkit deliverables below in Extra Details)

![Alt Text](https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/2X/1/137fa14e33c6b60152c5c4700e5f77bb82b719f1.gif)

### How does this benefit NounsDAO?
- **The Episode** — Exposure for NounsDAO in a novel, powerful narrative – with analytics & insights (average results per episode: 2.7M impressions, 321K views, 12K watch-time hours)
- **The Toolkit** — 3D tools that enables Nouns creators, creations, remixes with other IPs, and continued proliferation of Nouns to a new degree.
- **Our Vision** — Inspire creators with the episode, enable creations with the toolkit, and catalyze a cohort of Nouns as VTubers and next-generation virtual avatars.

### Community 
Working directly with the Nouns community is key for this project in several ways:
1. **Help choose what Nouns derivatives to feature** such as LilNouns, SharkDAO, skateboards from GnarsDAO, and art pieces from prop house. We love the extended Nouns community want to infuse this thriving ecosystem into the Toolkit and Episode.
2. **Help define the 3D style of the Nouns characters and environments**, as well as how Nouns express themselves using motion capture and animation.
3. **Help choose Nouns characters to be featured in the episode.** Some Nouns will be chosen for story purposes but we’d love the community to vote on what other Nouns get featured. Those Nouns holders will have the option to voice & motion capture their own Noun (assuming there’s dialogue).

### The General Timeline
* Phase 1: **Concept & Design + Episode Writing.** starts immediately (est 2 months)
* Phase 2: **Asset creation.** Starts as concepts complete (est 2-3 months) Will overlap with Phase 1
* Phase 3: **Launch Beta Repository.** Nov 2022 Assets are made available as they are created.
* Phase 4: **Episode Production Starts** Jan 2023 *When assets are finished (est 3 months)
Est Episode completion March 2023

### Toolkit Repository Timeline
* Phase 1: **Launch Beta Repository.** Nov 2022 Post assets as they become available
* Phase 2: **Create Beta How to Docs & Tutorials.** (these will roll out starting in Dec thru March)
* Phase 3: **Launch final Toolkit Repository.** March 2023
We will be sharing fun BTS & asset creation along the way via YouTube Shorts, TikTok, and Instagram content.

### Our Ask & Budget Breakdown 
We are asking for a total of $307.2K USD (192E @ $1600)
* Toolkit Concept Art & Design — $20,480 (12.8ETH)
* Toolkit 3D Modeling & Texturing — $99,040 (61.9ETH)
* Nouns Character Modeling & Rigging — $33,440 (20.9ETH)
* Toolkit Assembly & Episode Production — $141,280 (88.3ETH)
* Toolkit publishing & maintenance — $12,960 (8.1ETH)

The proposed budget + 15% to cover volatility will be converted to USDC immediately, and everything in excess will be retrurned to the DAO. If, due to high volatility, there is insufficient ETH to cover the proposed budget (307.2K USD), a second proposal will be made.
* Total: 192ETH * 1.15 = 220.8ETH

---

## Extra Details

### The Nouns World Toolkit Repository 
The CCO repository will consist of the cast of Nouns characters and environments made for the episode. Everything will be set up in the Unreal Engine (Free game engine software) and we're going to include all the scenes, cameras, lighting and animation from the episode which means, the Nouns City center will be alive with ambient animation and amazing cinematic lighting.  Additionally, the scenes from the episode will provide a starting point for making new content that looks amazing. All the Nouns characters will be rigged and ready for motion capture style animation (Both face and body similar to how Blu is setup in Xanadu).  For those with the right gear, this means you can instantly puppet any of those Nouns for V-Tubbing or creating your own cinematic content.  We're also exploring 'off the shelf' webcam mocap solutions (Cheap or free but body motion quality not as good as the expensive mocap suites) to include, if possible, to make inhabiting the nouns characters more accessible.  This would also allow using Nouns for Zoom calls, etc. 

### Nouns World Toolkit Details
* 12 Hero Nouns (Face & Body fully rigged for motion capture)
* 24 Secondary Nouns (Body fully rigged for motion capture. Minimal to no facial animation)
* Beautifully lit and fully animated environments:
* Nouns Downtown City Center (exterior, like Time Square)
        * Buildings reflecting the Nouns extended family
* Nouner Capitol Building (Exterior & Interior) 
* Nouns underground city / town (Exterior)
* Noun masters Dojo (Exterior & Interior)
* General modular city assets *for building new structures
* General nounish props & furniture 
* Nouns transport vehicles
* Wide Establishing model of the Nouns Planet
* Guide Book & Tutorials on using the Toolkit to create Vtuber & Cinematic content 

### Technical Details
* Unreal Engine 5 project - CC0
* Assets performant in Real-time (Streaming)
* Assets performant in VR
* Fully animated Hero scenes from episode included as examples
        * All hero Nouns characters ready for motion capture (Face and Body)

### Production Team
* Art Direction, Episode Writing & Directing
* Producer
* Lighting
* Motion Capture
* Animation
* Cinematography
* UE4 Integration & Tooling
* VFX
* Actors
* Editing
* Music
* Sound Design

### Episode Details
* 20-30 minutes

### About Xanadu & beyond
The heart of Xanadu is its zany stories and wild characters, but its soul burns to bridge and play in other universes. Thus Blu wants to help bring to life the budding spectrum of web3 Pop-Cultures from Nouns, cloneX and BAYC to small burgeoning Avatar projects backed by talented teams or individuals. All so they can collide on a bigger, more wild stage, with bigger, more wild crossover stories! Think Ready Player One and the Marvel Universe but creator content style!

### FUN BONUS IDEA: Wild Story Twist!
Blu’s adventure with the Nouns will live on beyond this episode in a ‘first-of-its-kind’ melding of entertainment & reality; After this episode airs, Blu’s fictional proposal (The one he formulates in the episode with help from the Nouns) is actually a real proposal that he submits to the Nouns DAO… and the outcome of that proposal dictates Blu’s future storyline – Will his proposal be good enough for approval, or will Blu have to evade the gangsters and find another solution to survive?

If you haven’t seen Xanadu yet, check it out [Xanadu on YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/xanaduBlu) and our original proposal teaser.
[![Image alt text](https://img.youtube.com/vi/xJTpIGK3tUc/0.jpg)](https://youtu.be/xJTpIGK3tUc) 

Thank you,
Cory & Stephen

title: Founding Partners of NFT Seattle
description:
# Founding Partners of NFT Seattle

(*TLDR, NFT Seattle is the first large scale Web3 event in the entire Pacific Northwest. We think it would be pretty sweet if the Nouns came in as title sponsors of this inaugural event*)

### **DESCRIPTION**

- Becoming the Nounding Partners / Presenting Sponsors of NFT Seattle creates an opportunity for the Nouns to build relationships with the Pacific Northwest’s Web3 community and solidify the Noun meme in the foundation of these new relationships.
- As we establish Seattle as a hub for Web3 innovation, we'd love for the Nouns to come in at the ground level and cement the meme as an integral part of Seattle’s Web3 ecosystem, positioned for maximum and lasting brand exposure. The Web3 community is still growing in Seattle so the probability of reaching new people (vs people that already know about the Nouns) is likely higher here, than most other major US cities. Plus Seattle's technically inclined demographic lends itself well to everything the Nouns stand for, though people here are still warming up to the whole idea of NFT's.

### **WHAT IS NFT SEATTLE**

- NFT Seattle is the first event catering to the broader Web3 community in the Pacific Northwest (Portland, Seattle, Vancouver, BC).
- The vision behind NFT Seattle is to establish Seattle as a hub for Web3 innovation & connect the growing community in the Northwest. We want to unite people in Seattle to educate & expose them to the opportunities & possibilities that Web3 brings to creators, businesses, artists, and communities.
- This event is mainly targeting the Web3 curious and as such, has a heavier leaning towards education.
- NFT Seattle will take place from 9/30/2022 - 10/1/2022 in Seattle at several venues including Block 41 and the Seattle NFT Museum (the worlds first NFT Museum).

### **WHY SHOULD NOUNS BE INVOLVED & WHY IT MATTERS?**

- NFT Seattle presents a unique opportunity for the Nouns to proliferate the Nouns meme and imagery (think, Noggles in downtown Seattle) across a region that is still trying to figure out Web3 but is on the cusp of a major Web3 breakout. A region that has already cemented itself as a global hub for technological and cultural innovation, with everything from Amazon/Microsoft to Starbucks and many more having been birthed here.
- As the first Web3 event in the Pacific Northwest, NFT Seattle will draw people in from Portland, Seattle, Vancouver BC and will lean heavily towards education plus fostering deep, meaningful connection between brands, thought leaders and other attendees. Early data suggests the audience will be a healthy mix between the Web3 curious, and those that are pioneering in the space.
- This event also creates a perfect opportunity for an IRL Noun meetup, for Nouns that are local to the region to come and engage with the local community while providing *Nouns on the Ground* an opportunity to execute their existing IRL events strategy, in a new untapped market. Also, hoping to partner with the Nounish marketing team to up-level the Nounishness of this activation if the prop passes. (Initial conversations have been started).

### **THE BREAKDOWN**

- **Presenting Title Sponsor of NFT Seattle** (”NFT Seattle presented by the Nouns”). Nouns branding will be prominently featured at the Event and the official After Party.
    
 
![](https://i.imgur.com/jDWDkc8.png)


    
- **Live Art Premier** that is nouns-inspired and incorporates the noggles, showcased by local high profile NFT artist [Jaiden ‘Jasti’ Stipp](https://www.instagram.com/jastidesigns/), the 16yr old that made over a million selling NFT's.
- As a way of thanking the Nouns for being a founding event partner for NFT Seattle, this commemorative art-piece will become a permanent fixture at every NFT Seattle annual event, an exclusive benefit only being extended to the Nouns. We’ll store this piece for future use, or the Nouns can opt to claim it for use at other IRL events.
- **Evergreen Video Content** to drive meme awareness and exposure: 2 daily sizzle Reels to be shared upon completion of each event day specifically highlighting the Nouns, and 1 sizzle Reel showcasing the creation of the custom mural. Video content to be produced by local media partner Brandtegic.
- **Nouns Branding exclusively featured on each String Backpack** provided to all attendees upon entry. Nouns stickers and swag will also be included in each swag bag (we'd need help designing the stickers).
    
![](https://i.imgur.com/poa1pxT.jpg)


    
- **Nouns Branding prominently featured on Social, Website, and Emails** that will be widely visible to all attendees, the public, and reviewed by various news outlets and media partners. We just recently kicked off a regional PR campaign, the Nouns imagery will be added to the the forefront of all marketing materials associated with the event as a title sponsor.

- **Fireside chat with a Noun**, an optional speaking opportunity where a designated Noun can share a bit about how the Nouns continue to play a key role in the advancement of the overall DAO ecosystem via the prop house model or a deep dive into cc0 NFT's, using Nouns as a use-case.


### **THE ASK**

This is a title sponsorship for NFT Seattle, and cost breakdown will be as follows:

- $65,000 USD ~ 40 ETH (calculated at 1 ETH = $1,600)
    - 10 ETH - Towards venue costs + event production team (labor)
    - 16 ETH - Towards A/V production + other venue related expenses
    - 10 ETH - Towards PR campaign, advertising, event marketing, videographers and video editing. (This includes printing graphics for all Nouns signage and marketing materials)
    - 4 ETH - Live painted Nouns inspired mural/art piece by Jasti (reusable at future events)
    
    ***N.B.** This cost also factors in event admission for Nouns that wish to attend (up until a pre-negotiated number) as well as an optional booth activation, if there are nouns on the ground available to man it.*
    

### **WHY SEATTLE**

- Seattle is an emerging market in Web3 with events just starting to take place. (ETHSeattle, blockchain events, and now NFT Seattle)
- Starbucks is entering Web3 and launching an NFT collection ([CoinDesk](https://www.coindesk.com/business/2022/05/04/starbucks-teases-web-3-platform-in-nft-announcement/)) and it’s in good company among other major brands with a substantial presence in Washington who are either ALL-IN or dabbling in Web3- Salesforce, Meta, Microsoft, Amazon, Google, Apple.
- Besides SF, Seattle has more tech talent than any other city in the country ([425 Business](https://www.425business.com/news/greater-seattle-no-2-in-tech-talent-report/article_37815015-8e5d-58f2-81fa-593715c7f695.html)) and it’s also the country’s most desired location for people aged 18 to 24 ([Bankrate](https://www.bankrate.com/real-estate/cost-of-living/seattle-wa/)), making the city an ideal place for Web3 brands to establish a presence in order to attract and retain top talent.
- 75% or more of PNW Angel Investors are interested in Web3 companies and founders. ([Madrona Venture Group](https://www.madrona.com/angel-investors-pacific-northwest-directory/))
- Seattle is the US’ primary gateway to Asia, the best city in America for outdoor activities, the 13th best city to live in overall, and the eighth-best city for raising a family. ([Patch.com](https://patch.com/washington/seattle/seattle-ranks-high-2022-best-places-live-list))
- There is a growing list of startups in Seattle building crypto, blockchain, and Web3 technologies such as Irreverent Labs, CoinMe, Nori, ArcBlock, Bittrex, CypherD, DragonChain, Luxor (Source: [GeekWire](https://www.geekwire.com/2022/a-list-of-startups-in-seattle-building-crypto-blockchain-and-web3-technologies/))

### **THE TEAM BEHIND THE PROPOSAL**

We’re a team of builders from diverse cultures and backgrounds, united by the goal of advancing the adoption of Web3 technologies.

- **Tessa Mero** ([@tesssamero](https://twitter.com/tessamero)) - VP of Developer Relations at Appwrite, over a decade of experience organizing events. She recently co-organized the [ReFiSummit](https://refisummit.org/) event.
- **Mark Robinson** ([@markarobinson_](https://twitter.com/markarobinson_)) - Partner at [Brandtegic](https://www.brandtegic.co/), a creative content agency, and the host of the ‘Marketing in the Metaverse’ podcast.
- **Lennox Matsinde** ([@lennoxtakura](https://twitter.com/lennoxtakura)) - Product Management at Starbucks Corporate, Founder of Satoshi’s Index NFT (a token gated SaaS Platform) and Founder of Inyasha Capital (Seattle based Quant Fund).
- **EXP Events** - Local Event Planning, Coordination, & Production Company and the production partner for Alaska Airlines, Microsoft, President Joe Biden, World Relief.
- **The Seattle NFT Museum** ([@seanftmuseum](https://twitter.com/seanftmuseum)) - The world’s first NFT Museum highlighting everything from educational exhibits to coveted 1-of-1 pieces, and hosting consistent live community events. The museum is founded by Seattle locals, the art-loving and community-focused entrepreneurs, Jennifer Wong ([@Jenerationy](https://twitter.com/Jenerationy)), the Head of Sustainability at Convoy and Peter Hamilton ([@PeterHamilton](https://twitter.com/PeterHamilton)), the Head of Television Commerce at Roku, Former CEO at TUNE, Advisor, Mentor, Board Member to various startups & companies.

Links:
[Twitter ](https://twitter.com/nftseattle_io)
[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nftseattle.io/)
[Website](https://www.nftseattle.io/) 

Shout out to our sponsoring Noun @brennen.eth who we've been working with on this proposal and everyone else that provided feedback on the initial draft.

title: Mucho Love 4 Month Extension
description:
# Mucho Love 4 Month Extension

![](https://i.imgur.com/VhBvzNf.jpg)
#### tl;dr:

A volunteering community focused on proliferating Nouns combining volunteering campaigns, community service, and social action.

### Where did Mucho Love come from?

A little bit over a month ago, the prop.house 655 & 656 ([Prop House ](https://prop.house/proposal/656) and [Prop House ](https://prop.house/proposal/655)) passed to fund “Nounifying Children’s Hearts.” This proposal supported the pilot for starting a volunteering community with the target of evolving into a Decentralized Non-Profit Organization.

### What is Mucho Love?

Mucho Love (a lot of love) is a community that seeks to contribute to various causes one event at a time while proliferating Nouns. **Mucho Love is born from the desire to help, creating a community that focuses on volunteer campaigns, community service, and social action**. We seek to impact various causes by addressing problems that affect our society. Mucho Love aims to cultivate a community in which all members feel part of something bigger than themselves, making them feel nounish.

### How does Mucho Love work?

Mucho Love was created by 5 founders, who wear many hats and structured what it is today. We plan to expand the team next year to escalate further and establish more specific scopes. Currently, we have over 30 community members eager to volunteer for the causes we are aiding.

Mucho Love currently works on a 9-step system.

1. **Ideation:** planning and deciding on activities.
2. **Outreach:** contacting the organizations/places, writing letters/petitions, and setting up dates/places.
3. **Chronogram/Requirements:** Itinerary, step-by-step program to be performed on events, pre-event checklist, proofreading.
4. **Quotations:** quotation of each item or service (3 quotations from different companies per item or service)
5. **Payments and Negotiations:** negotiating with businesses, establishing formal relationships, explaining MUCHO LOVE, and paying for services/items.
6. **Pre-Event:** revision of the pre-event checklist, volunteer count, and Zoom meetings with volunteers and multimedia team to prepare for the event.
7. **Event Day:** role call, transportation to the event, itinerary execution, feedback.
8. **Post Event:** post-event multimedia management and feedback from participants.
9. **Documentation:** establishing the framework to replicate the current working system by documenting for the continuous improvement of the project.

### How does this benefit the DAO?

**Charity** is a recurrent activity/topic within the Nounish ecosystem—that’s why we decided to start a nounish volunteering community that makes sure to proliferate Nouns with the values and vision it represents. **Mucho Love aims to become one of the Nounish platforms regarding community service, social work, and volunteering campaigns.** Mucho Love’s activities will all be shared through Twitter and Instagram, appealing to the masses and expanding global Noggle adoption.

Mucho Love is starting operations in the Dominican Republic but aims to develop a model that is replicable internationally. Also, if needed, we want to be able to travel to any part of the world to aid any team who needs help developing charitable efforts in their respective communities. 

### Goals

Our goal is to **establish the foundation of Mucho Love as a future Decentralized Non-Profit Organization** **that will allow us to replicate the model in any part of the world.** The structure/model created will be available for any team that wants to make charitable efforts in their respective communities. We also want to keep collaborating with established Nounish projects (like BigShotKlim’s pins and Messhup’s books) that can contribute with donations to proliferate Nouns further.

Mucho Love will carry out during the 4-month extension events/donations/activities among the following:

* Hospital Robert Ried
* Hospital Hugo Mendoza
* Red Misericordia (Orphanage)
* Hogar Escuela Santo Domingo Savio (Orphanage/School)
* Escuelita Café con Leche (Orphanage/School)

*2 institutions have not given a definitive yes; therefore, they are subject to change.

### Pilot results

The pilot successfully helped children feel joy despite going through difficult moments. We also showed what the Noggles are and what they can do. People fell in love with Messhup’s books and BigShotKlim’s Noggle pins. Children that used glasses felt even more identified with the Noggles. I can genuinely say that the pilot was a success; the Noggles were well received, and we helped out 300 children and their parents while proliferating Nouns, love, and optimism.

300 Children received 300 Nounish goodie bags containing:

* Messhup’s coloring book (300 total)
* Crayola box (300 total)
* Diapers (1440 total)
* Stickers (600 total)
* BigShotKlim’s Noggle Pins (100 total)

Video recap:


#### [MUCHO LOVE ](https://twitter.com/mucholovedr/status/1565689757740535808)

[@mucholovedr](https://twitter.com/mucholovedr/status/1565689757740535808)

Spreading ❤️ with ⌐◧-◧ *⌐◧-◧ are used to protect children’s identity https://t.co/PWvO4nhZYA

### Budget

24 ETH to be distributed in the following way:

* 19 ETH for donations
* 3 ETH for photo/video crew
* 1 ETH for t-shirts and hats for volunteers to use during the events
* 1 ETH for a storage facility

*The team has not received any compensation, nor is it interested in getting compensation until we go on-chain again by the end of the year.

*If any Nounish Project creator wants to collaborate with their products/ideas feel free to reach out to me.
