title: Nouns Stories: Short Shorts
description:
# Nouns Stories: Short Shorts

![](https://i.imgur.com/mCy0tjV.png)


## TL;DR
A team of award-winning animators and executives in primetime animation have teamed up with Nouns Stories to commission 10 comedic Nouns shorts. 


---


## Short Shorts - Season 1

We're commissioning 10 shorts for 6 ETH each. 5 of the shorts will be commissioned through a Prop House round. We will hand pick, and noun pill, five of our favorite creators to complete the other 5 shorts.

**The Rules**
1. The short must be funny.
2. The short must be 15 seconds.
3. The short must feature at least one Noun.

Proposers will submit a portfolio (or at least one example of previous work) + a 1 sentence creative pitch for their short.

**Distribution**

Once the 10 shorts are complete we will plan for an entertaining online premiere, looking to collaborate with people in the Nouniverse, creators, and media outlets with established audiences. Then we will upload these to our own branded social media accounts and anywhere else on the internet that will showcase them. We will also provide the video files publically, allowing anyone to use them in future Nounish projects and news.

**Awards**

We have an additional 20 ETH to award as prizes. We'll experiment with a variety of prizes and allocation methods including token gated Nounish community votes, live celebrity critic votes, and somehow we're going to get Goldy's dog to choose one prize winner. Also included will be a prize specifically for the best CC0 shorts to incentivize creators to release their content CC0.

All of our these additional prizes will be open to public submissions - artists not selected and funded through Prop House can create their short anyways and have another shot at competing for the prizes.

**Branding**

10 ETH is included to cover basic branding needed for this Prop House round. This could include logos, a simple website, a Nouns Shorts video bumper to play between shorts, etc. We will return any ETH we do not use to the treasury.


---


## Who is Nouns Stories
**Stoopid Buddy**
8 time Emmy-winning studio behind Robot Chicken & Nouns Documentary

**Walter Newman**
SVP at Adult Swim overseeing such shows as Rick & Morty, Robot Chicken, Smiling Friends, Lazor Wulf + Adult Swim shorts.

**Pixel**
[Goldy's](https://twitter.com/Goldypix) Oscar Shortlisted hybrid production studio are behind [nounish ⌐◨-◨](https://twitter.com/nounish) and the soon-to-be-released  animated short film "[The Wizards Hat](https://twitter.com/nouns_stories/status/1570433066900017152?s=20&t=T_vYbAun_YQEsZUlEwfjSA)" from the original Nouns Stories proposal. 

**Joshua Fisher**
Creative manager, SharkDAO Rep, Ugly Noun, The Nouns Square Foundooor, NounsDAO Buildooor and Nouns narrative advocate.

**Joel Cares**
CEO of [Lobal Global](https://lobal.global/), video [Director](https://joelcares.net/), founding member of [Nouncil](http://nouncil.wtf/), creator of [Nerman](https://twitter.com/nermanbot).


---

## The Future
Season 1 is just the beginning. Nouns Stories will produce and release content through a Perpetual Original Content Machine that culminates in a robust animation and film ecosystem plus yearly Nouns Film Festival. 

Short Shorts Season 1 will give us a taste of what multi-hypenate creators can make with Nouns + inspire the next wave of storytellers to get involved for subsequent funding rounds.

![](https://i.imgur.com/wf8GaM0.jpg)

(above: imagining a world where there are countless high quality Nouns style animated works to share)


---

## Funding

**Total Budget: 90 ETH**
 - Prop House Shorts Round - 30 ETH
 - Team Commissioned Shorts - 30 ETH
 - Branding Elements - 10 ETH
 - Prizes - 20 ETH

**Admin Costs**
 - 0 ETH  - the team will forgo compensation in this pilot round

**Funding Sources:**
 - **27 ETH** from Nouns Stories:
Additional funds were left over from [Prop 20](https://nouns.wtf/vote/20). For more information see this [Post in Discord](https://discord.com/channels/849745721544146955/917252751140982885/1019989277997801512). TL;DR is Nouns Stories will deliver THE WIZARDS HAT and roll over the original funds into this new project.
- **10.69 ETH** from the Noundry Committee:
The Noundry Committee has generously decided to donate their reward from [Prop 147](https://nouns.wtf/vote/147) to help fund this round of shorts.
- **52.31 ETH** from Nouns DAO:
We are requesting the DAO match fund our existing funds to bring us to our total budget of ~90 ETH. 


The proposal requests a transfer 52.31 ETH to 0x35aa2666C8Bc0AEb68ea64B463Cf57a74bDbf977

title: Nouns X Everybody
description:
# Nouns X Everybody

# TL;DR

This proposal will differentiate itself from other Nouns proposals aiming to create content for the Nouns (such as [165](https://nouns.wtf/vote/165), [113](https://nouns.wtf/vote/113) and [143](https://nouns.wtf/vote/143)) by focusing on creating an open process which will allow anyone to create a hype video.

While this prop is similar to [Prop 180](https://nouns.wtf/vote/180) , they are very different in their process, scope and goals. Nouns X Everybody is more about the process itself (which could be applied to other areas, not just content creation). Additionally, although this proposal pays more to the winning submissions - it is doing so because it requires the team to produce AND distribute without a guarantee of payment. While the number of views are not everything, they do matter, as we can have the highest quality content in the world but it only matters if people see it. 

Instead of determining what we think people will want to see, this proposal will instead outline the guidelines in terms of output as well as the minimum result we want achieved in terms of outcome. Leaving it open for anyone to implement their own creative process in order to achieve that result.

By funding this the proposal we would hope to achieve the goals of:


* Having a minimum of 10 pieces of original video content created, each with a minimum of 2k views on YouTube (20k total views minimum but I would expect much much more).
* Getting new and innovative ideas from both from within and outside of our existing community by allowing them creative control on the output.
* Bringing people into the Nouniverse as they will need to learn more about Nouns so as to create content which will enable them to win this challenge.
* Showcase how the various elements of the DAO (see: ‘The Process’) can be combined to create a cohesive process for project implementation.
* Demonstrating a proposal process that brings benefit to the DAO and rewards creators while not requiring compensation for the proposer. With 86% going to content creators, 12% going to marketing and just 1% going to administration along with 1% earmarked for an independent report on effectiveness of the proposal after 9 months. 


---
 
 

# THE BRIEF

**Create a short hype video that either explains or pulls people into the Nouniverse and if your video gets over 2k views on YouTube before April 30th 2023 you could be awarded part of the $200k fund.**

The **Top 10 Videos** ranked by number of YouTube views that meet the minimum entry requirements below will be put up for a vote where **4 winners** will be selected and awarded **$50k each**.

* Any person or team is free to submit an entry to this challenge. 
* To enter, simply create your video, upload it to YouTube and get people to watch it.

___

_**MINIMUM QUALIFYING CRITERIA**_ 

- Has more than 2000 organic views on Youtube by the end of the Submission Period
- Must meet the brief (i.e. It either ‘explains the Nouns’ or ‘pulls people into the Nouniverse’)
- Content must be original. While videos may reuse existing content if it is not mostly original it will not qualify.
- Is positive in nature and is rated PG
- Must be a video and not a YouTube "shorts"
- Should include ‘#EnterTheNouniverse’ in the description (so we can easily filter submissions)


---

Complete creative freedom is given to entrants on how they want to achieve the goal – it can be animated, live footage, a mixture of both or something completely different. Some teams might focus on higher end productions that explains Nouns to people while others might focus on something simple and unique that pulls people into the Nouniverse (i.e. see the different approach[ Coinbase](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uJ9pNQrz0fA&ab_channel=AnthonyKalamut) had vs other cypto companies during the superbowl in trying to achieve the same result). It is up to the creator to do what they think will work.



---
 

## SELECTION CRITERIA

The **Top 8 Videos with the most views on YouTube + 2 Videos chosen by the Selection Committee** will be entered into the Voting Round – where Noun holders will vote for the 4 winners of $50k each.



* All videos must meet the minimum qualification criteria
* Selected entries will be free to provide any additional information at this stage to be included in their entry which demonstrates why their content should win (for example, data from other social media platforms like Twitter, TikTok or any other measure of engagement)
* Selected entries may be asked to provide information to the selection committee proving that their YouTube views were organic that the data has not been manipulated or paid for.
* A person/team can submit as many entries as they want but only their best entry (which they can choose)  will be selected for the final vote.
* We are including 2 videos selected by the committee due to the fact that some entries may not be in the Top 10 in terms of views of YouTube but may have merit for nomination through a disproportionate level of engagement on other channels and/or be of exceptional quality or have uploaded their video late in the process but has gained a lot of views in a short time period.
---
 
 

# THE PROCESS

If this proposal is successful, the following process will take place:



1. **Proposal Passes:** $200k and 25 Eth with be transferred to a multisig controlled by the Multisig. The challenge has officially started.
2. **Submission Period:** There is a 5 Month window for anyone to create and publish their hype video.
3. **Create Marketing Dept:** 25 Eth will immediately be used to fund a Prop House Round with 5 Eth being awarded to the 5 best proposals detailing how they will market and find entrants for this project. (see note at bottom)
4. **Selection Period:** When the submission period has ended on April 30th 2023 there will be a 2 week selection period where the creators of the Top 10 videos will be invited by the Selection Committee to make their submissions. These submissions, including any additional information the creator wants to provide, will be uploaded to a Prop House round by the Selection Committee.The selection committee will be paid 3 eth for administering this.
5. **Voting Round:** Nouns will have a 1 week voting period to cast their votes for the 4 winning submissions to be awarded $50k each.
6. **Payment:** Funds will be distributed to the Winners by the Trusted Parties.
7. **Analysis**: 2 eth will be earmarked for an indpedent evaluation of this proposal after 9 months. To see how effective it was at achieving the stated outcome. 

_**Important Note:** If no one meets the minimum qualifying criteria, the Nouns pay nothing (with the exception of the 25 eth used to fund the marketing dept prop house round) and all funds are returned to the Treasury. But for every person or team that does meet the criteria, we have at the very least a piece of original video content with more that 2k views on YouTube._ 




** **

**Selection Committee:** The Selection committee will be comprised of 5 independent members of the Noun community, selected by Hindsight, whose job it will be: (a) select the Top 10 videos to be included in the final Noun vote as per the minimum qualifying criteria and the selection criteria above, (b) contact these creators to submit any additional information for the final vote and (c) upload those submissions to a Prop House vote.

The work of the selection committee is minimal and mostly administrative (checking that views are organic etc) and as such will only require 3 eth (of which I will get none).

_In order to maintain independence and to ensure a fair process members of the selection committee cannot enter a video to the challenge_


---

**Stated Goals of this Proposal** 
If this proposal passes, it success or failure will be measured against meeting the following criteria:
* The creation of a minimum of 10 pieces of good quality, original content before April 30th
* A minimum of 100k cumulative organic YouTube views across all content created in persuit of this prize before 9 months of this proposal passing
___



**Team** 
Really the point of this prop is that there is no 'team' but for the interest of transparency and to include a section I think should be in all props:
* Hindsight: I am not a member of any other teams, councils or projects and I do not receive any compensation from any DAO source. I have no conflicts of interest and will not financially benefit from this proposal.
* My only role will be to be on the multisig and to choose the selection commitee (A role I would be happy to give to someone else if they are suitable and want it!)


---

**Transaction Details**



* 30 Eth will be transferred to fund a Prop House Round to create a marketing team for the challenge, the selection committee administration cost and the retrospective report on outcome.
* $200k USD will be transferred to fund the prize pool.

_If less than 4 teams do not meet the minimum qualifying criteria then any USDC that has not been used will be returned to the treasury._

**Total Cost:** $200k + 30 Eth

**Multisig**

The multisig is a 3/5 consisting of the 5 best looking members of the dao

* [Hindsight](https://twitter.com/0Hindsight)
* [Elad](https://twitter.com/eladmallel)
* [Jarmen](https://twitter.com/jarmen43)
* [Maty](https://twitter.com/matyETH)
* [Adrianmcli](https://twitter.com/adrianmcli)

___

**A note on the 'Marketing Dept' creation**


The prop house round for 25 eth will award 5 submissions 5 eth to market this challenge and try and find people and teams outside both inside and outside of Nouns to make submissions. I will draft the prop house round if this proposal succeeds. An idea of submissions that will be encouraged are: contacting media schools, creating a landing pages with instructions, engaging with influencers to promote etc. 

___


**Why YouTube Views**


As stated earlier, YouTube views are not everything, but they do matter and after looking at the view count of Nouns content I think we could benefit from a proposal with a proposal that has goals in terms of distribution as well as production. 

Many of these videos will have more views on Twitter and other platforms and I would expect the same from any video created for this challenge. But for the interest of managing the proposal we will have to set one medium as the primary one for measurement and I think YouTube is the most appropriate.

2k views to reach the minimum entry requirement may seem small, and it is, but remember this is a MINIMUM, and we would expect any video that qualifies in the Top 10 to have many more views than that. 

Here you can see how many views Nounish content is currently getting on YouTube
[![YT-V.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/XYSbwxm9/YT-V.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/bsTWP0zv)

While some content that that use gimmicks, shows a lack of creativity nor effort, or does not show a clear comprehension of what the Nouns ecosystem is may meet the minimum qualifying criteria (whether due to the creator having large existing YouTube following or otherwise), ultimately the winning pieces of content be decided upon by a Nouner vote and so are extremely unlikely to be awarded anything for their efforts. So anyone who creates a video with the expectation of success should keep it classy and keep it Nounish.

title: Nouns AR Filters
description:
# Nouns AR Filters

## **TL;DR**

- Create 37 additional Augmented Reality Noun heads (increasing from 13 to 50 on Snapchat)
- Heads will be fully expressive with responsive eyes, mouth, eyebrows, and custom animations
- For the first time, bring all 50 Noun heads and 23 glasses to TikTok and Instagram

**Why?**
- AR filters can fully replace a person’s head or overlay Noggles to:
  - Record Nounish content within Snapchat, Instagram, and TikTok. 
  - Live stream as a Noun on Zoom, Discord, Twitch, etc.
  - Remix and Nounify TV and movie clips to make memes

**Compensation: 49.4 ETH**

---
## MEMES AND LIVESTREAMS
![](https://imgur.com/sSv90Sh.jpeg)
*Remixing existing footage and Nounifying it*


![](https://imgur.com/7N5B1WA.jpeg)
*Noun Square live stream*

[![](https://imgur.com/cEfJSf7.jpeg)](https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1312698913)
[*Twitch stream by Dota2 Esport Team*](https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1312698913)


![](https://imgur.com/R60fKbf.jpeg)
*On-chain proposal using the filters*


![](https://imgur.com/LeMQ1NN.jpeg)
![](https://imgur.com/PEW6XYS.jpeg)
*Simple GIFs made with [Snap AR filter noggles](https://www.snapchat.com/unlock/?type=SNAPCODE&uuid=d1507087c8f5479f89a73464805f76cb&metadata=01), see [Tenor page](https://tenor.com/users/coralorca).*

[![](https://imgur.com/dq8BsTw.jpeg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xG14_cNTFqY)
*[Nouns Coffee unboxing](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xG14_cNTFqY)*

---
## **VALUE PROPOSITION**

The Snap filters I created previously were used by the Dota2 Esport team (See [Grand Finals livestream](https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1312698913)), the Noun Square team (see [PropHouse winners interview](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dOP8N49QBTc)), Nounish videos (currently in production) and can be seen in some on-chain proposals and memes across Twitter and Discord. 

There is an increasing demand for Nounish content creation tools, and I often get the question: **"Wen my Noun in AR?".**

We are in the media propagation phase of Nouns, and with the expectation of AR-VR glasses becoming a main computational platform in the near future, Nouns should be AR-ready.

I propose to craft an initial set of 50 heads as expressive Augmented Reality filters, with responsive eyes, mouth, and eyebrows motion, as well as fun animations, depending on each Noun (e.g. a dripping brush, a fin flapping shark etc).

These filters will be simultaneously published on Snapchat, Instagram, and TikTok.

Nouns AR filters can be used for :
* Nounish Videos / interviews / social reels
* Live streaming / podcasts
* Undoxxed video calls
* Memes and GIFs. See my Tenor page https://tenor.com/users/coralorca
* Side proliferation on large social networks with common keywords. Get traffic by appearing on top of the "Retainer" and "Fire Hydrant" search engine for billions of users.

## **SCOPE: TIKTOK + INSTAGRAM + SNAP**

I initially received funding from NSFW to create the AR glasses on Snapchat, then won two Prophouse rounds ([round 5](https://prop.house/nouns/round-5/498) and [round 7](https://prop.house/nouns/round-7/860)) which funded 8 additional filters bringing the total on Snapchat to 13.

The frog head has been ported to TikTok and Instagram as a feasibility test.


For this proposal I will create: 


**- 50 Noun heads on TikTok with the ability to switch between the 23 glasses colors using a simple screen tap.**
Creating these requires [Effect House](https://effecthouse.tiktok.com/), TikTok’s AR filter authoring tool.
>🐸 [Try the TikTok frog head](https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMF92trdt/) 

![](https://imgur.com/2GCssla.jpeg)

###### The TikTok Frog effect has been played over 5000 times since its publication on 11/24/22 (without any marketing)

---







**- 50 Noun heads on Instagram with the ability to switch between the 23 glasses colors using a simple screen tap.**
Creating these requires [SparkAR](https://sparkar.facebook.com/ar-studio), Meta’s AR filter authoring tool.

>🐸 [Try the Instagram frog head](https://www.instagram.com/ar/667609521529085)
>Also available on [FB](https://www.facebook.com/fbcameraeffects/tryit/667609521529085/) and [Messenger video calling](https://www.messenger.com/ar/667609521529085)

![](https://imgur.com/vVXc6G7.jpeg)

###### Instagram video preview

---




**- 37 additional Noun heads on Snapchat (bringing the total published on Snapchat to 50) with the ability to switch between 23 glasses colors using a simple screen tap.** 
Creating these requires [Studio Lens](https://ar.snap.com/lens-studio), Snap's AR filter authoring tool.

Snap Lenses are particularly interesting because they:
- Integrate seamlessly with Discord, Zoom, Twitch, Google Hangout, OBS etc. using the free [Snap Camera](https://snapcamera.snapchat.com/) desktop application. See this [Youtube tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sWIZn\_-oFig) I made if you want to learn how to do it.
- Have advanced face tracking features with seamless animations

> 🐸 Try the Snap Frog head [here](https://www.snapchat.com/unlock/?type=SNAPCODE&uuid=8cbf1be819ec4a888f6917453a1d17c8&metadata=01)
🦈 Try the Snap Shark head [here](https://www.snapchat.com/unlock/?type=SNAPCODE&uuid=a1839d8ba0074f49882af6378ab63577&metadata=01)
🤖 Try the Snap Robot head [here](https://www.snapchat.com/unlock/?type=SNAPCODE&uuid=102be3194e2d49fb83d297e4b9d18103&metadata=01)
(You can use your phone and the Snapchat app or your desktop with [Snap camera](https://snapcamera.snapchat.com/))

![](https://imgur.com/M5Ybldo.jpeg)

###### Over 13 heads created on the Snapchat platform, see [creator page](https://lensstudio.snapchat.com/creator/6y\_fgP0Vr6RqaJt3jIJLRw).

---

## **PROCESS**

![](https://imgur.com/dsON2XB.jpeg)

###### Consistency across the different authoring software: Snap’s *Lens Studio*, Meta’s *SparkAR*, and TikTok’s *Effect House*.

I have been optimizing this pipeline for some time, and each trait needs custom animations depending on its shape. The geometry has to be considered individually, and some traits are more challenging than others. This is a similar process to what I went through when translating all 2D Nouns to 3D voxels with 3Dnouns.com. You can speed up the pipeline with work habits and experience, but each head requires specific attention to craft the Nounish details that make the difference.

## **METRICS**
I will share metrics from the different social platforms with the community.
Here are some metrics from the Snapchat filters created with Prophouse funding and some recently published filters on TikTok.

#### TIKTOK
![](https://imgur.com/Qdb7oSX.jpeg)
###### Close to 20k plays in two weeks with 0 marketing.

#### SNAPCHAT

![](https://imgur.com/PFoW7Ri.jpeg)

###### The Robot Noun’s head has almost 600k plays in November! This is an interesting case of side effect proliferation. 

![](https://imgur.com/T1NMuqt.jpeg)

###### BudLight was the first filter created, and currently totals over 4k plays.





## **PORTING MODELS TO INSTAGRAM AND TIKTOK**
I will import the 50 models to Meta’s and TikTok’s AR authoring software (respectively *SparkAR* and *Effect House*) to publish them to Instagram, Messenger, Facebook, and TikTok and reach a wider audience. 
Regarding the workflow, the 3D assets will be re-used, however, they still need to be imported, positioned, scaled, lit and the animation triggers need to be configured on an individual basis and depending on each software capabilities. 
From a technical standpoint Snap Lens Studio > SparkAR > TikTok Effect house. My goal is to make each Noun head as consistent as technically possible across all different platforms. See Frog head above.

## **WHICH NOUN AND WHEN**
I will deliver between 10 and 20 heads per month, released on the three platforms simultaneously as they are created. I will create community requested heads first, and otherwise will craft the traits that I think will be the most successful. 
👉Here is an open To-do if you want to add your favorite traits to the list: 
https://www.notion.so/Filters-List-1b12bdc8b51e42f4b726b650b3784f7a

![](https://imgur.com/lrjR7ac.jpeg)

###### Potential AR Filters candidates 

## **COMPENSATION**
For the Prophouse winning rounds, I suggested 4 filters for 2 ETH, when ETH was around 1800-2000 USD. The market price for such 3D AR lenses sits between 1500-5000 USD per filter. 
For reference, [this MAYC filter I created](https://www.instagram.com/ar/1025321405001469/) was commissioned by LollaPalooza for Snapchat and IG and was around 5k USD - It is a little more complex with many eyes and snot coming out of the nose.

With ETH currently around 1200 USD, I adjusted the price to 3 filters for 2 ETH, around 800 USD.

- Setting up the geometry and creating the expressions system for each of the 37 heads in Blender.
**(37/3) * 2 = 24.7**

- Porting the geometry to TikTok, Instagram, Snapchat, setting up the animation triggers and publishing to these platform with consistent tagging and video previews.
I am estimating this work at 0.18 ETH per filter for a total of 137 filters.
**(50 on TikTok + 50 on Instagram + 37 on Snapchat) * 0.18 = 24.7**

This brings the total ask at **49.4 ETH** with an average price of 0.36 ETH per filter. 

---

## **ETH ADDRESS**

title: Prop House Mainnet
description:
# Prop House Mainnet

[![](https://i.imgur.com/zcJlAJu.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iJsYV5eDEX8)

*(👆 click on video for a Nouns Prop House teaser)*

---

***tl;dr:**
We’ve reached the one year mark since the inception of the idea for Prop House! Over that time period, Prop House has become a core piece of infrastructure for the development of the Nouns ecosystem – onboarding a sizable percentage of the most impactful builders while spreading the Nouns meme far and wide. We are requesting 570 ETH to continue to fund development of Prop House over the next 6 months (Jan ‘23 - Jun ‘23).*

---

***State of the Prop House(s):**
On Dec 1st, 2022, Seneca hosted an open call to update the community on what we’ve been up to since the [proposal #105](https://nouns.wtf/vote/105). You can view the [slides](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1TbJsbXWCPxbMyE25Xr_kfQjJJYMtGw0HEYuLrtdkndI/edit?usp=sharing) and recording of the talk [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qD9v1ihIRmw).*

---

## Onboarding builders
The most important outcome of Prop House for Nouns has been its ability to onboard a large percentage of the most impactful builders in the ecosystem. **More than funding, the core feature of Prop House is about activating builders**. Whether it be for folks who had never heard of Nouns before or those who were just hanging around, Prop House was the mechanism that took them from inactive to building within the ecosystem.

Given Nouns is about bottom-up brand building as opposed to top-down centralized direction, we hope that Prop House can continue to serve as a tool to execute on that Nouns vision. Below is a list of some of the builders who’ve been activated by Prop House:

![](https://i.imgur.com/2ZeeWk9.png)

## Where we are today by the numbers
Our last proposal ([#105](https://nouns.wtf/vote/105)) passed on July 18, 2022. Since then, we’ve made substantial progress on all core Prop House KPIs:

![](https://i.imgur.com/JtrkRUm.png)

All our charts are seeing sustained month-over-month growth despite market downturns:

![](https://i.imgur.com/fBw6qTd.jpg)

![](https://i.imgur.com/P5rXSsH.jpg)

![](https://i.imgur.com/4q3e9hS.jpg)

![](https://i.imgur.com/jr1bwSR.jpg)

The funnel from prop award to prop completion has maintained a high conversion rate. Close to 85% of all prop winners go on to complete their proposed work. Below is an analysis on all prop winners from all funding rounds within the [Nouns house](https://prop.house/nouns) (18 funding rounds and 105 awarded proposals):

![](https://i.imgur.com/H71CV2j.jpg)

## Spreading the Nouns meme
Over the past 5 months we’ve onboarded several communities, most notably [Meebits](https://prop.house/meebits) via [Ape Coin DAO funding](https://forum.apecoin.com/t/aip-110-meebits-prophouse-sponsored-by-apecoin/8219). By doing so, Prop House has spread the Nouns meme far beyond our immediate community. In tandem with Prop House growth comes furthering the reach of the Nouns meme along with what Nouns stands for: building.

![](https://i.imgur.com/nTQsPIo.jpg)

## Product
The Prop House team has been busy working on the core product ([prop.house](https://prop.house)). A brief summary of what we’ve done follows:

- Contracted one the best designers in the space (0xHab from Rainbow)
- Revamped UI across the entire app
- Implemented multi-round houses
- Upgraded voting UX
- Open sourced the [repository](https://github.com/Prop-House/prop-house-monorepo/).
- Released a [GraphQL interface](https://prod.backend.prop.house/graphql) for Prop House data which lead to projects like [NounsAtlas](https://nounsatlas.com), [Voters.wtf](https://voters.wtf) and [Nounish.cv](https://nounish.netlify.app/)

## Protocol
We’ve also made strides in the development of the Prop House protocol.

The protocol leverages both Ethereum and Starknet in an effort to provide the best possible user experience. This dual-chain architecture enables Prop House users to propose and vote by signing a message, while decentralizing the entire funding flow.

We use Ethereum as the operations and execution layer, where houses are managed and payouts are made, while Starknet handles all user actions that occur within a funding round.

All of the code is publicly available today in the [Prop House repository](https://github.com/Prop-House/prop-house-monorepo/tree/protocol).

Below are some of the core pieces of infrastructure we’ve developed to support the protocol, where we are currently, and what to expect as we near mainnet launch:

- The [protocol](https://github.com/Prop-House/prop-house-monorepo/tree/protocol/packages/prop-house-contracts) itself, which has been deployed to Goerli.
- The [Prop House SDK](https://github.com/Prop-House/prop-house-monorepo/tree/protocol/packages/prop-house-sdk), which simplifies interaction with the protocol (L1 & L2).
- The Starknet Relayer, which is responsible for submitting signed proposals and votes to Starknet on behalf of users.
- Ethereum & Starknet subgraphs, which are currently in development.
- Current blockers:
    - [Cairo V1 Migration](https://medium.com/starkware/open-sourcing-cairo-1-0-b3100a664bb0)
    - [Support for V1 on StarkNet](https://medium.com/starkware/starknet-regenesis-the-plan-bd0219843ef4) (expected Q1 ‘23)
    - Protocol audits (pending testing on testnet)

Assuming no major hiccups, we aim to deploy the protocol to mainnet before the end of Q1 2023.

## Financials
*The Prop House financials doc is publicly available [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iKGgedZmAzMNCFkd2PqjBd-ZgutrOjuYqfirDG1wS3g/edit?usp=sharing)*

Over the course of one year and three proposals ([#23](https://nouns.wtf/vote/23), [#62](https://nouns.wtf/vote/62), [#105](https://nouns.wtf/vote/105)), Nouns DAO has funded the Prop House team 555 ETH for deploying towards Nouns builders and 695 ETH for development and operating expenses.

![](https://i.imgur.com/oxC4c8l.png)

*Note: current burn rate for Nouns funding rounds is low (~20-30 ETH / mo). If at any point the DAO chooses to have another party deploy Nouns House Funding, we will return all remaining funds to the DAO.*

## What’s next?
### Protocol launch
We are aiming for a mainnet launch by the end of Q1 2023. What follows is the timeline we are executing against to get to launch:

- Migrate to Cairo V1
- Complete Goerli testing
- Finalize Prop House SDK & Starknet Relayer
- Launch subgraphs for Ethereum & Starknet
- Developer documentation
- Protocol audit

### Product development
Alongside the transition to the protocol as the data layer, we will continue to develop the UX of app:
- Core UX: better proposing, discovery and voting user experiences.
- The launch of house and round managers such that anyone can create a house, deposit funds and initiate funding rounds.
- Implementation for infinite rounds for grant pods to run their entire operation via Prop House.
- Develop social features for communities. 

## Sustainability
There are several avenues to explore on how to make Prop House sustainable. For the time being, we are continuing to pursue funding by Nouns DAO as we believe it to be a positive sum engagement. Below we dive into potential avenues:

### Nouns DAO funded (current)
To date, Nouns DAO has funded development costs of Prop House over the past ~12 months (695 ETH). For the current model to continue to work, Nouners would have to agree that the value created for Nouns by Prop House is higher than that of the development costs. In this framing, Nouns DAO is a patron to Prop house where its ROI is the onboarding of high impact builders, the attention generated by Prop House as public infrastructure by Nouns DAO and it being infrastructure for Nouns to run on.

### Fees for usage
The true and tried approach is turning on fees at the client and/or protocol. This approach would require a substantial increase in volume (to the order of about 50-100x) to maintain current burn rates. So while feasible, it is not a solution for the short term. 

### Experimental
**Nounish DAO**
In prop [#105](https://nouns.wtf/vote/105), we posed Prop House DAO as a plausible avenue to making Prop House sustainable. While it is still a potential route, there are concerns as to whether or not the DAO makes sense at all. At the core of it is whether the Nouns DAO format is appropriate for non-purely meme driven protocols. There’s also the question of whether every protocol needs a DAO and a corresponding governance token. So while the DAO is not out of the question, we believe that with experiments like [Nouns Builder](https://nouns.build/), the answer will become clearer over time. 
**Pure Meme NFTs**
There’s a case to be made where Prop House NFTs are minted to hold provenance value. This alone could capture long-term upside in the same way a visual artist and their collectors do. 

## Funding Request
570 ETH to fund development of Prop House protocol & client over the next 6 months (Jan ‘23 - Jun ‘23). 
- 486 ETH: 3 engineers, 1 designer and 1 all hats.
- 84 ETH for OpEx including contractors, infra, audits, bounties, translators, etc.

Funds would be received by the [Prop House team multi-sig (3/5)](https://app.safe.global/eth:0x5BcD6f3B0a5519D448FBDf33204091bbE097C992/) where the signers are Seneca, Solimander, CDT, VapeApe and Devcarrot.

title: Nouns funding ZachXBT
description:
# Nouns funding ZachXBT

**NOTE: This prop is a resubmit of prop 177 since it was cancelled in the "queued" stage due to [my error](https://twitter.com/noun40__/status/1600889013216235525). I had delegated my nouns to the houseofnouns team without knowing that until a prop reaches execution (even after voting passes) removing voting power from the proposer's address can mean that anyone can cancel the prop. Unfortunately it was cancelled as a result. My sincere apologies for the need to revote.**

------

[@ZachXBT](https://twitter.com/zachxbt) is a public good serving the crypto ecosystem through tireless research exposing [countless scams](https://investigations.notion.site/). Recent events have highlighted the dire need and importance of such work. This prop proposes to fund 100 ETH to their donation address: zachxbt.eth (address can be verified from their twitter profile).

Donations have always been somewhat controversial within Nouns governance. [Prop 21](https://nouns.wtf/vote/21) donating 169 ETH to Gitcoin grants was one of the most contentious votes in our early history. [Prop 108](https://nouns.wtf/vote/108) donating 500 ETH to Ethereum protocol development (via the Protocol Guild) was much more unanimous but still there was discomfort and discourse around whether the DAO was becoming "a tax inefficient way for DAO members to make donations."

I agree that we shouldn't resort to becoming a complacent vehicle of passive philanthropy. We should instead aim to actively contribute and be a net producer of public goods ourselves such that our meme (brand) can fully capture the provenance value (claim on originality of) the public work and thus leverage the virtuous cycle to do more than what capital alone could have done. However, there should be exceptions to this rule if there is an urgent and common public cause that warrants highlighting. I would like to suggest that this is such a case. Crypto needs more validators like ZachXBT.

With donations we need to be extra wary of conflicts of interest or self-dealing. Unfortunately there is no way to prove this cryptographically, but I attest that I have no prior (or planned future) relationship with ZachXBT and that today was the first time I contacted them (via twitter) to ask for their permission to make this proposal.

title: Distributing Nouns Vision Noggles for Proliferation Purposes
description:
# Distributing Nouns Vision Noggles for Proliferation Purposes

Written by [Sasquatch](https://twitter.com/PartSasquatch), [Toady](https://nounsagora.com/delegate/toadyhawk.%E2%8C%90%E2%97%A8-%E2%97%A8), [Maty](https://nounsagora.com/delegate/maty.%E2%8C%90%E2%97%A8-%E2%97%A8), [Benbodhi](https://nounsagora.com/delegate/benbodhi.%E2%8C%90%E2%97%A8-%E2%97%A8) and [Gami](https://twitter.com/0xigami).
Special thanks to [9999](https://twitter.com/lastpunk9999) for helping by creating the [custom contract](https://etherscan.io/address/0x6ff4FF4Fe59D7EC571f36e36961B032027e68ceE#code).

## Intro:
[Prop 57](https://nouns.wtf/vote/57) funded the creation of 8,250 pairs of luxury sunglasses made by Nouns Vision.  Approximately 560 of those have been sold to individuals.*

As per the on-chain proposal, 500 tokens of Nouns Vision NFT's (each redeemable for an individual pair of physical glasses) were transferred to the Nouns DAO treasury. 

## Proposal: 

The authors of this proposal are asking the DAO, on behalf of the communities they represent (Nouns Esports, Gnars, The Noun Square), for an allocation of these sunglasses to be used to further proliferate Nouns DAO as well as help market and drive new buyers towards Nouns Vision.

By distributing these tokens across various sub-communities, we can further proliferate Nouns through physical interactions with the highest quality noggles available.

The undersigned sub-communities of Nouns DAO are asking for fifty Nouns Vision tokens each (150 total) from the Nouns treasury in order to continue their efforts of proliferation.

- [The Noun Square](https://twitter.com/thenounsquare)
    - Proposed use: Media appearances from hosts, and distribution via giveaways on Twitter and YouTube, including as prizes for a planned Nouns DAO Awards Show in December.
- [Nouns Esports](https://twitter.com/nounsesports)
    - Proposed use: Primarily the pairs will be kept on retainer and esports operators will coordinate with players to have them used in prominent competitive-gaming events or live-streaming opportunities. Additionally, a portion will be distributed as gaming competition prizes.
- [Gnars](https://twitter.com/gnars_dao)
    - Proposed use: Extreme athletes could wear these in social media posts, at IRL events, and in interviews. All of which have high potential for visibility, especially outside of the Nouns ecosystem.

Conversation towards this effort has already been taking place in the #57-sunglasses channel of the Nouns Discord server. For further context, see the initial post towards this idea [from Gami](https://discord.com/channels/849745721544146955/940715393901789336/1012904461380882503) and continued discussion [from Worthalter](https://discord.com/channels/849745721544146955/940715393901789336/1025188064877879316) who suggested distributing pairs from the treasury.


Additionally, our sub-communities would be interested in exploring Zora's functionality of a "[Finders Fee](https://support.zora.co/en/articles/5961853-how-to-set-a-finder-s-fee#:~:text=Sellers%20can%20set%20the%20Finder%27s,paid%20to%20the%20referrer%27s%20address)" to further incentivize the promotion of Nouns Vision, with the goal to aid in selling out the entire collection.

*(`*`) Even though the total number of mints is around 1800, this includes 500 for Nouns DAO, 500 presumably reserved for the special edition disco noggles, and 250 for the team.*

title: House Of Nouns
description:
# House Of Nouns

![house of nouns (1).png](https://imgur.com/ZdV5hbZ.png)

[Click to watch trailer **⌐◨-◨**](https://youtu.be/8YKFK_h4kQU)

# **TLDR**

We're requesting 340 ETH for 6 months to continue building [House of Nouns](https://twitter.com/houseofnouns), a supercharged platform + context layer for Nouns governance. We want to make governance participation fun. 

Our vision is to create a governance platform that is both delightful and easy to use, empowering voters to effectively govern NounsDAO. The client is being created on top of an upcoming open-source framework, built by nounish developers, for nounish developers.

# Current progress

We've had early success with [House of Nouns](https://houseofnouns.wtf/), with many Nouners and non-Nouners alike expressing their love of the intuitive interface. We want to continue building on this success and make it easier for people to participate in governance in an engaging way.

![Screen Shot 2022-12-07 at 9.40.34 PM.png](https://imgur.com/D7F1Q0a.png)

Not familiar with House of Nouns? You can discuss proposals with others, view important context, and vote all in one intuitive interface on [https://houseofnouns.wtf](https://houseofnouns.wtf). 

**Some data:** 

- MAUs - growing 100% month / month
    
    ![Screen Shot 2022-12-08 at 7.03.38 PM.png](https://imgur.com/aKCSwBO.png)
    
- Working with Nouns, Lil Nouns, and Gnars. In talks with many more communities.
    
    [https://houseoflilnouns.wtf](https://houseoflilnouns.wtf/proposals/69)
    
    [https://gnars.house](https://gnars.house) 
    
- ~13.5% registered-user market penetration
    - 170 registered users / 1263 total members in Nouns (delegates + Nouners + anyone who has voted or made a proposal on-chain or in Prop House)

# **Core vision and goals**

Our vision is to make it easier for voters to participate in Nouns governance by providing rich context, intuitive conversation tools, and seamless integrations with other Nounish platforms. This will be built on top of an open framework, empowering developers and solving impactful problems specific to nounish governance. 

In short:

- Provide all context on proposals, voters, builders, and team members, and view all conversations from Discord, Twitter, and Discourse in one place
- Build a custom forum client directly into HoN that is backwards compatible w/Discourse, allowing users to create and discuss proposal drafts and get early feedback
- Provide first-class support for Nouns forks and Prop House, and deeper integrations with Atlas, Federation and Agora
- Create the open source House of Nouns framework, serving core data displayed on the site through a GraphQL API, paired with a developer friendly SDK for building on top of House of Nouns infrastructure

## Product Breakdown

### **Context layer**

We will attach more information to proposals, such as FAQs, comments, relevant links, conversations from other platforms, video attachments, and more. We're currently working with @maty.eth on integrating data from [proposals.wtf](http://proposals.wtf). 

![Screen Shot 2022-12-09 at 1.20.48 PM.png](https://imgur.com/NWxsu7o.png)

We also will provide more context on Nouners, builders, and team members, such as their past proposals, voting record, and Agora profile, directly in HoN. 

![Screen Shot 2022-12-07 at 9.35.06 PM.png](https://imgur.com/b8zipr3.png)

After a proposal is executed, we will make it easy to see what has been delivered as a result.

### Forums + conversation stack

We're building an alternative forum client like Discourse that pulls data from Discourse, and integrates token signaling and Ethereum-based identities. This will be built into House of Nouns and will allow users to create and discuss proposal drafts, get early feedback, and graduate drafts to proposals. It will also provide context on builders and [members](https://collective.xyz/nouns/members), and allow token-based voting.

![Screen Shot 2022-12-09 at 1.19.55 PM.png](https://imgur.com/oXSPL8Y.png)

We also want to provide more intuitive ways to get early community consensus, such as upvote/idea boards. This will allow users to easily move from an idea to a draft proposal, get comments, and then move to an on-chain proposal with ongoing comments and voting.

### Integrations

Deeper integrations with other Nounish products like Nouns Atlas and Nouns Agora. 

View conversation from Discord, Twitter, Discourse etc. in-line on [houseofnouns.wtf](http://houseofnouns.wtf). 

First class support for Nouns forks, Prop House, Federation, and other governance sources

- one-click governance clients for Nouns forks
- vote on Prop House rounds directly in HoN with intuitive and easy UI
- Federation integration (ex: vote on HoN as a Gnars holder)

While we will make sure our infrastructure can support all Nounish communities, we will focus on solving problems specific to Nouns governance in the next 6 months. We believe this is where we can have the biggest impact.

## House of Nouns Framework

We are building an open source framework to give builders the tools they need to build custom governance and discussion experiences for their communities. We will build House of Nouns on top of this framework, in a similar vein to [Vercel](https://vercel.com/) being both a builder and end-user of NextJS. 

The main components of the framework are:

Open access to core data displayed on the site through a GraphQL API.

React [SDK](https://github.com/collectivexyz/sdk) for developing on top of House of Nouns infrastructure, including hooks to access data, pre-built components etc. 

## Differentiation

Agora approaches the problem of low governance participation from the delegation perspective. Don’t want to vote? Delegate to someone to do it for you. 

House of Nouns approaches it from the conversation and context-aggregation perspective.  Empowering Nouners to vote independently and be empowered to think for themselves. 

Both approaches are valid and necessary for the ecosystem to grow. We will be working closely with Agora to ensure we don’t build the same things and otherwise waste valuable energy. 

## Success Metrics

Our goal is to have 30% or more of the Nounish ecosystem using (voting/discussing/viewing) House of Nouns *every week*. Currently, about 14% are registered users. We believe that with further improvements to the proposal conversation stack and better user experience, we can reach this goal. 

Ultimately, our goal is to have the House of Nouns framework and SDK integrated into 10 or more clients by July 2023.

We will use these as the two primary metrics to evaluate our success in 6 months.

# **Transparency & decentralization**

As a governance platform, we want to avoid centralization of power by taking the following measures:

- Building the House of Nouns framework as an open source public good
    - Offer up all data through APIs and a developer friendly SDK
    - Transition discussion data to open data layers as soon as an attractive option has wide adoption / traction
    - Offer a React SDK for components and data fetching
- Current House of Nouns team members added together will commit to not represent more than 5% of NounsDAO.

Our goal is to open-source the core building blocks of governance and discussion, and provide killer developer tooling on top of the HoN rails so anyone can build custom experiences for their communities and subcultures. 

## Sustainability

We plan to generate revenue by offering bespoke upgrades to other DAOs similar to Red Hat, as well as charging hosting costs for larger communities. Our goal is for the HoN client to become self-sustainable within 12-16 months. These upgrades will be built into the broader platform and framework for all users. 

For the HoN framework, we’re exploring alternative public goods funding routes (Nouns model, Gitcoin etc.) so we can be empowered to continue building something maximally useful for the entire ecosystem. 

# ********Team********

We are a small startup [(collective.xyz)](https://twitter.com/collectivexyz) that has been building for Nouns and won the governance client mandate [round](https://prop.house/nouns/nouns-governance-clients) 3 months ago. 

House of Nouns team:

[dadkins](https://twitter.com/dadkins_) - 9 years in software, longtime crypto hacker, cofounder [@collective.xyz](https://twitter.com/collective.xyz)

whise - lead data engineer ex: Amazon / longtime buildor

[Wojciech](https://kocjan.net/) - Killer product engineer, built [nounslaunchpad.wtf](https://nounslaunchpad.wtf)

[Tim G](https://github.com/timmyg) - former head of engineering at crypto startup, full stack maestro

with support from [rocketman](https://twitter.com/rocketman_w) and [jac](https://github.com/jac18281828)

# Funding Request

We compare closely to other proposals, like [Agora’s 3-month proposal](https://houseofnouns.xyz/proposals/154) (170 ETH for a team of 4 for 3 months (14 ETH per mo./ person), or Nouns AI Pod (12.75 ETH per mo./ person). 

We request 340 ETH in USDC to fund development of House of Nouns framework & client over the next 6 months (Jan ‘23 - Jun ‘23).

• 330 ETH: 4+ engineers (13.75 ETH per mo./ person)

• 10 ETH: funding for Prop House round(s) to build out alternative clients and views into governance+discussion on top of the HoN framework.  

50% deposited immediately to the teams wallet via [USDC payments contract](https://nouns.wtf/vote/172).

50% USDC streamed over a period of 6 months from a 3/5 multisig held by trusted members of the community. Signers for this safe will be: [Al409](https://twitter.com/7x7x7eth), [Noun 40](https://twitter.com/noun40__), [CDT](https://twitter.com/cdt_eth), [rocketman](https://twitter.com/rocketman), and [Gami](https://twitter.com/0xigami).

# Deliverables

**House of Nouns client**

The entire conversation and governance stack in one supercharged client, with deep composable integrations both in-and-out to other platforms.

Everything you’d ever care to see and do with a proposal in one intuitive UI :) 

**House of Nouns Framework**

GraphQL API, open-source SDK, and component library to empower builders to create custom governance and discussion experiences.

# Testimonials

![Screen Shot 2022-11-20 at 4.33.42 PM.png](https://imgur.com/zR8OJFg.png)

![Screen Shot 2022-11-20 at 4.33.10 PM.png](https://imgur.com/BFYDMap.png)

![Screen Shot 2022-11-20 at 4.34.16 PM.png](https://imgur.com/i2CusQB.png)

![Screen Shot 2022-11-20 at 4.32.04 PM.png](https://imgur.com/2yz0abz.png)

![Screen Shot 2022-12-07 at 3.31.08 PM.png](https://imgur.com/OAWDhIL.png)

“congrats on HON, it has officially become my go to for governance” - @cryptoseneca 

[Gnars.House](http://Gnars.House) feedback:

![Screen Shot 2022-11-24 at 4.42.21 PM.png](https://imgur.com/reTXFhM.png)

![Screen Shot 2022-11-24 at 4.42.32 PM.png](https://imgur.com/CLZ9KKj.png)

Happy to answer any questions on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/houseofnouns), on [https://houseofnouns.wtf](https://houseofnouns.wtf), or in the Nounish Builders Discord etc. 

Thanks for reading friends, stay nounish ⌐◨-◨

title: Nouns CC0 Animation Generator & Interactive App
description:
# Nouns CC0 Animation Generator & Interactive App

![](https://i.imgur.com/iFxuOIn.gif)![](https://i.imgur.com/KG0Tk59.gif)![](https://i.imgur.com/TZkJ9bL.gif)

## TL;DR

We’re aiming to bring Nouns to life by animating all Nouns assets as public goods for cc0 use. We'll build tools for users to generate & access their own animations quickly and easily for use in any project. There's 20 unique and thoughtfully crafted animations to choose from with over 467,000,000 possible animation outcomes.

* Through a front-end app, anyone can enter a Noun ID or mix and match traits to create their own custom Noun and export animations on the spot.
* Developers will be able to programmatically access any of these animations instantly and seamlessly through an API and/or a URL.
* Interact with your Noun (including custom ones) through an interactive app on a daily basis with actions like eating, sleeping, playing, and more! The status of each Noun will change throughout the day and you can tend to it accordingly to keep it alive, happy, and healthy.

## Introduction & Background
---
Hello Everyone,

I'm Jeff (aka heyjeff.eth, jefe) and I’ve been developing an app over the past year that aims to engage NFT collectors by bringing their NFTs to life. Quick backstory:

The concept was inspired by the popular Japanese phenomenon ‘Tamagotchi’ released in the late 90’s. Each handheld device contains a virtual friend the user must tend to in order to keep it alive, happy, and healthy. Interestingly enough, it’s a style of game that you don’t necessarily ‘beat’ or ‘win’. It’s more of an experience of having a buddy that you can play with, care for, and watch grow throughout it’s lifespan, forever.

I thought it’d be fun if people could do the same with their NFTs, so I decided to build a prototype. At first it started out as just a silly napkin sketch, but now we’re proud to say we’ve recently finished adding support for all 6,969 CrypToadz, each with 11 unique animations totaling over 75,000 files! *(That’s 7.6 GB of raw toad data)*. For those who own a CrypToad, you can check out the app [here](https://tinycitizen.xyz).

Here’s some footage:
[![CrypToadz Gameplay](https://i.imgur.com/KHs4MZi.png)](https://vimeo.com/780511900)


## Motivation and Goals
---
What we’re aiming to do is leverage the tech we’ve developed for CrypToadz and adapt it to build tools so that anyone can generate, access, and download Nounish animations on demand for cc0 use.

To do this, we’ll develop an easy-to-use Build-a-Noun app through which anyone can choose a pre-existing Noun or build their own by mixing and matching traits at will or at random. Users will be able to preview animations on the fly and then instantly download any or all of the animations they like, with the option of exporting the individual animation frames as well. The app is future-proofed too, so every Noun that is born each day will be readily accessible.

Not only that, but any animation for any Noun configuration can be easily accessible via a back-end API and/or a URL for developers to use in their web apps instantly and seamlessly.

As an added bonus, anyone can immediately interact and play with their Noun or custom Noun through our other interactive app we’ve already built!

Ultimately, the goal of all of this is to empower people to actively use Nouns in engaging, refreshing, and easy ways to help spread the meme.

## Build-A-Noun App, prototype & poc
(early prototype shown, does not represent final product)
[![Build-A-Noun Prototype](https://i.imgur.com/Viv5UfU.jpg)](https://vimeo.com/777492078)

The 20 total actions and states are: idle (breathing/blinking), happy/loved, laughing, talking, dancing/head bob, eating: pizza, mushroom, veggies, fruit, hamburger, playing a gameboy, sad/crying, drinking: coffee, water, tea, health/mana potion, tired, sick, and sleeping.

The above is an early prototype solely to convey the concept of the Build-A-Noun app. The final product will have a redesigned and intuitive interface, with way more options and functionality, such as:
* Select transparent or any background color (hex or rbg input)
* Quick select any existing Noun ID config
* Searchable traits by ID or name
* Randomize traits button
* Flip the animation (left-facing vs right-facing)
* Change output animation speed
* Apply an rbg tint to the animation
* Apply a black and white filter to the animation
* Resize animation to specific dimensions
* Export all individual frames for a given animation
* Pick and choose which animations to export
* Add text overlays
* Share-to-Twitter button to quickly tweet your creations 

Flipped![](https://i.imgur.com/bIxYeRQ.gif) B/w filter![](https://i.imgur.com/eI9okhg.gif)
rbg(255, 5, 555) tint![](https://i.imgur.com/1n2f2xY.gif) Sped up 3x![](https://i.imgur.com/FsMU13t.gif) Flipped, 0.75x speed, rbg(293, 65, 5) tint![](https://i.imgur.com/AaLiqTR.gif)


*Examples of animation customization options*

In total, we’d pre-generate 8,700 animation files (435 Nouns assets x 20 unique states), each with an average of 30 frames per animation. That's  a total of 261,000 individual frames to bring this vision to life! There are 23,377,200 possible combinations for a Noun, and 467,544,00 possible animations outcomes (23,377,200 x 20)!


## Why?
---
Currently, there isn't a scalable tool in the Nouniverse that allows users to quickly produce a wide range of highly customizable Nounish cc0 animations on demand.

Game developers, content creators, and everyday users can benefit from such a tool as a building block to create even bigger and more Nounish things!

We're trying to fill this gap in the Nounscape by providing STOMMs (*Super Tool of Mass-Memeification*) in an area that is lacking. With this tool in place, I believe we'll see an explosion of new Nounish content for everyone to use and enjoy as they see fit.

Plus, being able to interact with your Noun deepens our emotional connection to them!

## Sneak Peeks
---
We made the following animations for Lil Nouns for fun as a test, but the same concepts apply for Nouns. Here's a peek at 10 out of the 20 total states. Choose any background color you like, or none at all (transparent).

![](https://i.imgur.com/u0ZdEUw.gif)
Idle

![](https://i.imgur.com/p9ecpWa.gif)
Eating pizza

![](https://i.imgur.com/Ygk8hBI.gif)
Sleeping

![](https://i.imgur.com/euvT8qO.gif)
Playing Gameboy

![](https://i.imgur.com/CqHr6cL.gif)
Happy

![](https://i.imgur.com/Wnxg4Uj.gif)
Sad/Crying

![](https://i.imgur.com/1TBwth1.gif)
Drinking coffee

![](https://i.imgur.com/LmXiVcz.gif)
Sick

![](https://i.imgur.com/qbxc4Wy.gif)
Tired

![](https://i.imgur.com/oIWI1F3.gif)
Health potion

## Interactive App ~ Bonus ~
---
Anyone who owns a Noun or builds one with our Noun Builder app can interact with it on a daily basis through an app we've already built (works on mobile too)! Each Noun will be animated to reflect it's current state or action - it will truly feel like your Noun has come to life!

Here are the following mechanics:

4 Stats (each max val of 100):
* Fullness
* Energy
* Happiness
* Health

3 Player Actions (each grants XP needed in order to level up):
* Feeding – Increases fullness and happiness
* Sleeping – Increases energy and health
* Playing – Increases happiness, decreases fullness and energy

3 Conditions:
* Can’t sleep while starving
* Can’t play while sleep-deprived
* Can’t eat while sick

3 Items (purchasable with points earned from completing actions)
* Coffee – Triples the amount of XP gained, but cannot sleep for 8 hr
* Health Potion – Replenishes health to full
* Mushroom (can be easily reskinned to another object) – 1 of 4 potential effects, chosen at random:
    * Jumbles stats at random
    * Earn a random amount of XP
    * Gain 1 level
    * Eat a poisonous mushroom and die
* All stats decay by 2 every 4 hours automatically, forever
* Sometimes, at random, 1 of the 4 stats will be depleted to zero if all stats are non-zero
* If neglected for ~8 days, the NFT will die
* NFTs can be revived, but lose 1 level and costs points
* Highest levels are ranked in a public leaderboard

![](https://i.imgur.com/PaRnHTs.gif)
*Nounish interactive gameplay demo (limited features)*


## How is this valuable to Nouns??
---

### 1. Public Goods & Network Effects

Everyone from experienced devs to everyday users will be able to generate & access Nounish animations on demand, either through the API or the front-end tool within a few clicks.

This means anyone -- enthusiasts, developers, and/or content creators can save countless hours by bootstrapping these animations to be used any way they like! Some examples include: 

* Enrich existing apps or websites
* Use as stickers and/or emojis for Discord servers
* Use the animations to develop a game
* Use them to make merch and/or NFTs
* Enhance Nounish media like tweets, infographics, or videos
* Use as pfps
* Download the individual animation frames to make sprite sheets
* Use the frame data to create lip-synced animated avatars for video/audio calls

-- the possibilities are endless!

The end result will lead to quicker turnarounds for prototypes and media creations, and act as a catalyst for the proliferation of new Nounish content overall.

Quote from devcarrot, Nounder:
"This sounds like a very fun idea, I love the animations. Would you be willing to make the data accessible to other developers via a public API? Maybe with something like a license that requires attribution? It could be interesting to have Nounish characters hanging out on the various projects’ sites; imagine Timpers’ disco floor but with TinyCitizen characters rendered in real time.

The disco floor:
![](https://cdck-file-uploads-europe1.s3.dualstack.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/standard21/uploads/nouns/original/2X/a/a30c42ece4e30f7f4aac00f6979b82a057b19eb9.gif)"


### 2. Rally community around organic and fun reward systems

Through the interactive app we’ve already built, it provides opportunities for users to earn rewards through quests.

As an example, we’ve successfully rewarded 80+ unique CrypToadz players with a CrypToadz hat and pair of Nouns glasses to those who reached level 10 with a CrypToad through the interactive app. Everyone shared how much they loved this event!

This provides a more rewarding experience because the merch drop felt earned rather than simply given. In turn, it promotes camaraderie and a sense of fellowship among the community who want to achieve a mutual desired result by partaking in shared experiences.

Any Nounish DAO that wishes to engage their audience can task their community with completing certain actions through the app and granting them an award upon completion.

**Reward bundle: CrypToadz Hat + Noun Glasses + NFT NYC Coaster**
![](https://i.imgur.com/Xupiot6.jpg)
![](https://i.imgur.com/f8PToWz.jpg)

*pssst… This event is still ongoing! If you want a CrypToadz hat and Nouns glasses you can still grind for them! Find me on Discord :wink:*

### 3. Tap into & activate new creators and builders
If we make these assets readily available for people to access in an engaging and easy manner, it could open up doors for new people to enter the ecosystem.

Those that need assets to build on Nouns in new or interesting ways but have no developer or animation experience can often feel discouraged not knowing where to start.

With the Build-A-Noun app as a building block, we can inspire existing Nounish community members as well as potential new ones to create something Nounish easily and quickly. Anyone can get up and running with tens, hundreds, or thousands of animations ready to use within minutes.


## Deliverables
---
* Create an easy-to-use front-end tool + website where anyone can create and download unique cc0 gifs for any Noun configuration on the spot. The 20 unique states/actions are:
    * Idle (breathing + blinking)
    * Happy/Loved
    * Sad/Crying
    * Laughing
    * Talking
    * Sleeping
    * Dancing/Head bob
    * Eating
        * pizza
        * mushroom
        * fruit
        * veggies
        * hamburger
    * Drinking
        * coffee
        * water
        * tea
        * health potion
        * mana potion
    * Playing a gameboy
    * Tired
    * Sick
* Create a back-end API, where anyone can instantly grab any animation for any Noun configuration for use in their web apps programmatically via an API key and/or a URL
* Revamped front-end design with mobile-friendly version to generate animations on the go!
* Integration with our existing free-to-play side-app where users can interact and play with their Nouns (already built)
* Publicly host the raw base64 encoded png frame data for all Nouns assets in json format so anyone can use the animation frames how they like

## Timeline
---
### Total: 10 weeks

Each individual trait needs to be manually animated for all 20 states. That's roughly ~1,000 files per week (435 x 20 / 8). Some take shorter than others because they're static in a given animation, or they mimic the same motion as another animation and can be ported. Regardless, there is a lot of upfront work to be done.

### Weeks 1-4:
Front-end work, complete site redesign and development. Mobile-friendly optimization. Developing gif creation software with various customization options.

~50% of animations files complete

### Weeks 5-8:
Back-end work on API creation. Work on image processing and manipulating animation frame data. Create hosting solution for animation data.

~100% of animation files complete

### Weeks 9 & 10:
Hook-up back-end to front-end. Allow 2 week buffer for testing & bug fixes, or any last minute optimizations/improvements.

## Who we are
---
![](https://i.imgur.com/EkzLRN9.gif)**heyjeff.eth** - Full-Stack Dev / Design / Vision / Logistics

I’m an engineer, problem-solver, and purveyor of ideas that I believe are worth telling.

I've been involved in the NFT space since early 2021 and became Noun-pilled a couple months ago through some people I’ve met within the CrypToadz community. Since becoming a recent Nouncillor, most of the free time I have is spent in Nounish discords meeting cool new people, discussing ideas, and learning as much as I can about all things Nouns!

Some of my credentials include:
* 6+ years as a professional engineer/designer
* 3 separate CrypToadz proposals funded
    * 185 total “for” votes, 0 total “against” votes across the 3 props
    *    Total of 21E funded (most funded individual from within the CrypToadz community)
    *    All proposal deliverables fulfilled
*    1 CrypToadz Prop house round funded
* Created a hosting solution to make 75,000+ unique CrypToadz cc0 animations publicly available via URLs
    * As an example, [here's](https://cryptopetz.s3.amazonaws.com/game-files/0x1CB1A5e65610AEFF2551A50f76a87a7d3fB649C6/5500/5500.gif) CrypToad ID #5500 in it's idle state. To see any toad in action, replace '5500' in the URL with the desired ID!
    *pssst.... try appending an action to the trailing ID, i.e., 5500-pizza.gif*

![](https://i.imgur.com/SaBqVim.gif)![](https://i.imgur.com/y5TVXAK.gif)![](https://i.imgur.com/J19sE2F.gif)![](https://i.imgur.com/QR05Zb7.gif)![](https://i.imgur.com/ReV5Ffs.gif)

---

![](https://i.imgur.com/7XnfUOt.gif)**PixelFowl** - Pixel Artist / Python Dev / Power Metal Enthusiast / Former Chicken Parent

"Hi! I’m Pixelfowl, also known as Johannfowl. I’m a Brazilian pixel artist and animator that loves coffee, power metal and writing short stories. I used to be a freelance copywriter, but I always loved art and indie games. So, in the first opportunity I had, I tried pixel art — that hooked me instantly.

During this past year I had the amazing opportunity of working with Jeff and it really changed the game for me. After learning a lot, creating hundreds of animations and writing thousands of lines of code, we’re making things that we thought were impossible, and now we’re going even further!"

PixelFowl's credentials:
* Lead pixel artist behind 75,000+ CrypToadz animations
* Made all animations available for cc0 use
* Developed core python script to automate the generation of CrypToadz animations

![](https://i.imgur.com/HmfnOFp.gif)![](https://i.imgur.com/DJTXuta.gif)![](https://i.imgur.com/PWe54Lk.gif)![](https://i.imgur.com/vQQtZ2Z.gif)![](https://i.imgur.com/9wYtQxC.gif)

## Current Success Metrics (as of Oct '22)
---
As for our interactive app, CrypToadz holders seem to really enjoy it. Here’s a few metrics that show it’s stickiness. Note that no capital or time has been spent on marketing or advertising up to this point.

Retention Rates:
Day 1 Retention: 25% (Industry average)
Day 7 Retention: 15% (Industry average)
Day 30 Retention: 9% (Above industry average)

Active Users:
Daily Active Users / Monthly Active Users = 28% (Above industry average)


## Proposed Funding
---
55E for **Deliverables** within **Timeline** (10 weeks)
(immediately converted to USDC to avoid volatility)

*    60% Development of front-end Build-A-Noun app + back-end API tool
      * Complete website redesign/development & deployments
      * Mobile-friendly optimizations
      * Gif creation software development with various customization options
      * API endpoint creation
      * Software development for image processing/manipulation
      * Create hosting solution for animation frame data
      * Hooking up back-end to front-end, testing & bug fixes

*    40% Asset generation
     * Animating all 435 assets each in 20 states
     * Script development on animation automation and converting animations to workable json data

At the proposed cost, it works out to around <$8 per animation file, and $.00015 (not a typo, 1/100th of 1 penny) per possible animation using this tool.

## Testimonials
---
A lot of people have mentioned how much they loved their toad animations and seeing them in action, some even buying their first toad because of the interactive app! I think it’d be fun to provide this same experience for the Nouns community.

*"This sounds like a very fun idea, I love the animations."*
-devcarrot, Nounder

*“Big fan of Toadzgotchi personally; Love what you're building.”*
-HEEEEEEEEEEE, CrypToadz founding team

*“Excited for lore and Toadzgotchi as well.”*
-Gremplin, pixel placer extraordinaire, artist for CrypToadz and Nouns

*“I love my animated toad! Thank you!
"Diggin the game.”*
-Adam Fern, Founding team @ CashApp, Head of Product @ Square (Loans)

*“Omg the Toadzgotchi proposal is cool. My wife who isn’t into crypto much that was one of the first things she asked me about NFTs ‘so do you have to like feed your toad and stuff or what?’”*
-Toadyhawk.⌐◨-◨, Nouns delegate and The Nouns Square Founder

(Toadzgotchi was the initial name of our app circa 2021)

![](https://i.imgur.com/k98tM7F.jpg)
+many more AMAZING supporters who couldn't fit on the page! THANK YOU!

## Future

In the future, we'd like to add more animations and more Nounish subcommunities (Lils, Gnars, etc), plus explore the idea of letting anyone upload their own animations to the builder in a review style process. This way, we can accrue an expansive database of assets to be used by all as the go-to solution for Nounish animations!

## Thank You

I sincerely appreciate everyone who spent time reading this. I am excited and eager to help contribute to the future of Nounish animations together! If you'd like to reach out for questions or comments, please do so - I'd be happy to chat!
