title: Creator Contests - a Nounish Funding Middleware
description:
# Creator Contests - a Nounish Funding Middleware

## Tldr
Fund the Calabara team with 60 ETH to continue developing Creator Contests for a 3-month sprint.

## Introduction
Hi NounsDAO, we’re nick and weez, the tandem behind Calabara and Creator Contests. 

### Our Nounish Journey: part 1

Both of us were introduced to Nouns by way of SharkDAO, which we first joined over a year ago. We were fascinated by the Nouns protocol and community and soon began building out sharkish tools to ease some of the unique challenges of a Nounish subDAO. We created a dashboard for SharkDAO, which included widgets for a snapshot client, calendar, and token-gated document center. We wanted to build a simple interface for casual members to be able to quickly catch up on the latest in SharkDAO and Nouns. Soon after, other communities asked if they could have their own dashboards. We open-sourced the code, modularized the components, and invited other web3 groups to join. Today, we’d describe [Calabara](https://calabara.com/explore) as an open-source design house for public infrastructure and applications.

![](https://i.imgur.com/V819CqQ.png)


By prop [62](https://nouns.wtf/vote/62), we began to get excited about many of the ideas being communicated by the Prop House team. We'd been thinking deeply about community funding protocols for some time ourselves, and were eager to experiment with the Prop House model. Unfortunately, we weren’t yet able to run our own Prop House rounds at SharkDAO (because we don’t use an erc721 for governance). Prop House wasn’t open-source yet, so we decided to fork the core ideas of Prop House and build something of our own: Creator Contests. 

## Creator Contests … WTF?

Creator Contests are a nounish middleware for distributing funds to creatives.

Creating scalable funding infrastructure at all levels is a critical building block in establishing Nouns as the world's largest open-source brand. Creator contests build upon the strong foundations developed by the Prop House team while experimenting with novel features to create unique incentive systems and new ways to fund builders – allowing any Nounish community with an ENS the ability to start running their own contests.

## How does it work?

Similar to Prop House, participants create submissions in response to a contest prompt, and voters choose the best ones. Once the contest is over, funds are distributed to the winners. All contests follow this basic model, but administrators have full control over the contest settings to layer-on additional components. Here’s what we offer today …

* Submitter Rewards
    * Define 1 or more winning ranks (1st, 2nd, ... nth place)
    * Define 1 or more rewards for listed ranks (ETH, ERC20, ERC721)
![](https://i.imgur.com/LK2Vg12.png)

* Voter Rewards
    * Voters that accurately choose rank N submission will split X reward.
    * Can be used to create unique incentive systems.
    * NOMO-style games can be created, where voters join forces to try to choose the 2nd best submisison without pushing it to first place.
![](https://i.imgur.com/IBwqCwI.png)

* Participant Restrictions
    * Token thresholds required for participants to submit or vote
    ![](https://i.imgur.com/YcwFxhK.png)

* Voting Strategies
    * Token -- Voting power based on token holdings
    * Arcade -- Uniform voting power for all qualifying voters
    ![](https://i.imgur.com/KpVyBT8.png)

* Twitter Integration
    * Collect submissions via Twitter interactions
    * Inherit all existing infrastructure while proliferating via Twitter
    ![](https://i.imgur.com/0J7OkhJ.png)
    ![](https://i.imgur.com/cDWuZ26.gif)
    
* Additional Parameters
    * Vote total visibility
    * Anonymous Submissions
    * Self Voting
  ![](https://i.imgur.com/jkCGMtY.png)


## Our Nounish Journey: part 2

Before Spring 2022, we had bootstrapped the project ourselves. We were lucky enough to receive support from SharkDAO, and they funded us with 7 ETH to develop an MVP of Creator Contests. We launched our first contest in September, and have helped fund 45 nounish creatives with ~4 ETH and 25k ERC-20 tokens since. 2 months ago, we received a small grant of 8 ETH from NSFW to develop the Twitter Integration mentioned above. We have groups like SharkDAO, Composables, TNS, and the Society of Nounish Cartoonists running contests as we speak. We are now ready to take Creator Contests to the next level.

![](https://i.imgur.com/Fk7grjB.png)


## Goals for the funding period

For this funding period, we’d like to focus on “Top of the funnel” funding infrastructure. This means implementing a scalable protocol for funding creatives in the 0.069 - 3 ETH range. Our goal is to fund 100+ nounish creatives in the 3-month window.

While bringing the codebase out of “MVP mode” so it can sufficiently scale to other Nounish pods (and make it easier to fork), we’ll work on the following upgrades:

* Support native video and other media formats
* Add vote audit reports
* Add voting capability for Noun delegates
* Experiment with new voting strategies
* Simplify contest initialization process.
* Improve our twitter algorithms
* UX redesign - It’s time for CC to get Nounish


We’d also like to answer the following questions:

* Are voter rewards a feature or a bug?
* In the voting period, how impactful are visible vote totals on a communities ability to choose the “best” submissions?
* Does submission history serve as a relevant talent repository for other pods?
* Are deep Twitter integrations viable for other tasks, like governance? (Nouncil, Nerman, etc)
* Are there ways to maintain a certain level of submission quality without directly moderating submissions?
    * Prop House already sees a certain percentage of “low quality” submissions, and we’ll see higher levels at this funding tier. Are there ways to ensure a certain quality standard without direct moderation? Learnings from this experimentation could be layered on top of Prop House and other applications.







## Defining success

Success at the funding tier we are targeting is tightly coupled with onboarding. We’ll define onboarding for the scope of this project as the following:

* New creatives
    * Introduce new creatives to Nouns and extension communities
* Existing creatives to larger funding tiers
    * Support creatives in the earliest stages of ideation that can translate to quality Prop House or NSFW proposals
* Between Nounish extension communities
    * Increase the discoverability factor of extension projects and communities through different contest designs and synergies, i.e.
        * TNS and Composables co-host a round
        * Multi-community voting
        * Twitter contests

Of course, success for us also hinders on our ability to proliferate the meme. Twitter integrations drastically increase our proliferation potential -- elevating contests from a siloed web app to a publicly discoverable and interactable experience. We're focused on lifting the stack as close to the "public edge" as possible and see the potential for these integrations in other Nounish areas.  

Defining success is one thing, measuring it is different. For this funding term, we’ll do so manually by following up with participants and winners while exploring ways we can automate and better measure this in the future.


## Prop House

*Why not just fork Prop House for real?*

While we haven’t really heard this much, it’s a valid question that we anticipate some Nouners might have.

Halting further experimentation to go back and layer our changes on top of the PH codebase feels like a step backwards at this point in time. We envision a coordinated approach where both PH and CC are able to sandbox and test different ideas and merge the ones that work. Ultimately, the far more relevant component to fork will be the smart contracts for a trustless implementation that the PH team is leading, which we fully plan on doing. 

At worst, CC is an alternative client for Prop House. At best, it is an experiment in funding infrastructure, working alongside Prop House in developing sound protocols for high velocity, trustless, and scalable funding infrastructure for web3 communities – all powered by Nouns.

## Team

Weez: frontend, designer, UX, support
Nick: lead dev, fullstack

## Links
* [Calabara](https://calabara.com/explore)
* [Github](https://github.com/calabara-hq/calabara)
* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/calabarahq)

## Budget

60 ETH for continued development

3/5 Multisig tasked with sending 30 ETH of project funds to the team wallet upon execution, and setting up a 3-month stream for the remaining funds.

Signers:

Nick: nickdodson.eth
Benbodhi: signed.benbodhi.eth
Juan: juanx.eth
JoshuaFisher: joshuafisher.eth
ToadyHawk: toadyhawk.eth


## Proposed Transactions

0x55d1f4091Ced357cD4C4F9dd12531b8fDBe2dd26.transfer(
    60.0 ETH
)

title: Extremely nounish
description:
# Extremely nounish

![](https://i.imgur.com/0jlR9rL.gif)

## 💸 Requesting 694.20 ETH to cross the chasm

![](https://i.imgur.com/4S66vhJ.png)

Let's scale the provision of extremely nounish public goods through culturally relevant activations. Ultimately empowering action sportspeople to uplift their communities with the first "never-ending [expression session](https://www.surfertoday.com/surfing/the-history-of-the-expression-session-in-surfing)."

*ie. Our subculture's rendition of the [nouns virtuous cycle](https://medium.com/@punk4156/the-nouns-virtuous-cycle-95586bb9c7c9).*

## 🤘 Gnars is Extremely nounish

[Gnars](https://gnars.com) is an extension ([fork](https://gnars.wtf)) of Nouns dedicated to supporting the artistry of extreme athletes. We've [sponsored over a dozen](https://gnars.com/riders) skateboarders, snowboarders, surfers, scooter riders, inline skaters, roller skaters, skiers and an entire motorcycle club.

[![](https://i.imgur.com/0DCX8jK.jpg)](https://twitter.com/nounish/status/1569692294529581056)

[Since receiving 69 ETH to get started](https://nouns.wtf/vote/51) just 7 months ago, we've attracted millions of views on our nounish content, caught the attention of industry icons such as [Bob Burnquist](https://www.instagram.com/bobburnquist/) and have been onboarding people in *extremely nounish ways, like these 1.5M views with [Tom Rohrer](https://www.instagram.com/toms_tutorials/):*

![](https://i.imgur.com/QkY1C9e.jpg)

Most recently we've been making a splash in Brazil thanks to our involvement with I LOVE XV, an annual skateboarding event in its 10th year. With [a budget of just 6 ETH](https://gnars.house/proposals/0xb63306dbfe950dd9754d5edcf8f48c6ff9bdd32eeeff4c644cb90c974a3055fa) those involved brought together 1000+ skaters in Rio de Janeiro to shred the biggest noggles ever made:

[![](https://i.imgur.com/656PzQ6.jpg)](https://twitter.com/nounish/status/1593765220425486337)

Not only did they produce terabytes of incredible content, our Brazilian crew provided the inspiration for this proposal. We learned that instead of just sponsoring individuals, we should empower them to uplift their communities as a whole:

![](https://i.imgur.com/JLwvCJb.jpg)

Now we're an internet collective of over 750 members ready to actualise our subculture's rendition of the "nouns virtuous cycle." We will establish the first "never-ending [expression session](https://www.surfertoday.com/surfing/the-history-of-the-expression-session-in-surfing)" to power our CC0 media machine.

![](https://i.imgur.com/aObap4q.gif)

Gnars have funded [over 30 proposals](https://snapshot.org/#/gnars.eth), submitted the [first nounish DAO to DAO proposal](https://nouns.wtf/vote/142) ([origin](https://snapshot.org/#/gnars.eth/proposal/0x013702a15624613befa0ed1488350610f8d98c3d71c82e240183e8692600a5f9)), cast the [first nounish cross-DAO vote](https://twitter.com/0xWiz_/status/1589946679872360448) ([federation.wtf](https://www.federation.wtf/daos/gnars)) and have led by example to help countless nounish builders.

## 🤯 Here's what 69 ETH looks like

Rather than bore you with the details, this timed open edition NFT is a highlight reel of what we've achieved since Proposal 51 passed. Click the embed below and it will take you to [our Zora minterface](https://create.zora.co/collections/0xdd930e878bdf23a78573998a451464c5bf56eeca).

[![](https://i.imgur.com/IMAUuEA.jpg)](https://create.zora.co/collections/0xdd930e878bdf23a78573998a451464c5bf56eeca)


Packing everything we've done into a 90 second video is near impossible, so we hope what made the cut serves as a memento for those who collect it. Many thanks to [4156](https://twitter.com/punk4156/status/1600505145397317634) and [Jacob](https://jacob.energy/predicting-provenance.html) who inspired our making of this compilation and its subsequent minting. Shoutout [Kai](https://twitter.com/m3thaverse), [Davin](https://twitter.com/davinoyesigye) and [Trizzy](https://twitter.com/trizzytrunk) for pulling everything together at short notice.

## 🤔 What'll 694.20 ETH look like?

Brazil taught us that cultural relevance is incredibly important. For example, the giant noggles you've seen people skating are permanently installed in Rio de Janeiro at Praça XV, alongside other iconic urban sculptures installed each year by Coletivo XV.

![](https://i.imgur.com/uOAnnqd.png)

Our giant noggles are in the same town square as the giant skateboard, one of the most photographed landmarks in Rio, third only to Christ the Redeemer and Sugar Loaf which are both globally recognisable.

[![](https://i.imgur.com/H5xaVey.png)](https://twitter.com/0xigami/status/1598537522141069312)

The ability to do more activations like what we've seen in Brazil depends on the roll-out of the greatest onboarding effort Nouns has ever seen. Let's explore some of the ways we plan on scaling:

### Builder onboarding via seasonal Prop House rounds

Gnars DAO has attracted builders who've paved the way with their creative approaches to activating their communities. Many hail from emerging markets where we can have an outsized impact and their values are already closely aligned with ours as crypto natives.

![](https://i.imgur.com/uYMx45z.png)

[Prop House](https://prop.house) allows us to run mandated funding rounds each season that will see builders competing for the opportunity to uplift their respective communities. Each round will fund activations as described below and we've already received expressions of interest from suitable candidates throughout South America, Africa, Asia and more.

### Public goods delivery through builder-led activations

Builders funded each round will be equipped with everything they need for public goods delivery through thoughtful and culturally relevant activations. Leaning on our experience in Brazil, we'll help motivated individuals become local heroes.

![](https://i.imgur.com/56iuFKh.gif)

Our community will help them to implement nounish obstacles, crypto wallets and NFTs (10% of Gnars are for onboarding), merch and stickers, photo walls and banners, and to receive delivery of remuneration, Noun 189 skateboards and various types of noggles.

### Hashtag campaigns to catalyse social media curation

We're not looking for "[flash in the pan](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/flash_in_the_pan)" type events and are committed to the pursuit of the "[nouns virtuous cycle](https://medium.com/@punk4156/the-nouns-virtuous-cycle-95586bb9c7c9)." We will leverage hashtags like **#ThatsGnarly** across all platforms to launch ongoing crowd-sourced social media campaigns.

![](https://i.imgur.com/B82OcJz.jpg)

Such a rudimentary approach removes all barriers to entry so that the first step in joining the movement is simply posting to a hashtag. We can meet newcomers where they already express themselves, curate the best content based on impact and prepare creators for [a Web3 revolution](https://thatsgnar.ly).

### Creator onboarding to the Gnars Revolution protocol

[Revolution](https://github.com/collectivexyz/revolution) is a protocol from [House of Nouns](https://houseofnouns.xyz) (and [gnars.house](https://gnars.house/)) designed to enable the earning of governance rights through contributions other than capital. We are working closely with the team to give Gnars holders a reddit-like curatorial experience for content submitted to #ThatsGnarly.

![](https://i.imgur.com/wCsJkxJ.jpg)

Content surfaces on a Web3 leaderboard at [thatsgnar.ly](https://thatsgnar.ly) after being submitted by extreme sports creators across social media. Competing in the "gnarketplace" for attention, top performing content is minted and sold as NBA Topshot style NFTs in daily auctions – *ie. Prop House for tricks.*

![](https://i.imgur.com/fxNEx13.jpg)

*Trick NFTs released under CC0, Gnars NFTs drawn from 10% of supply already allocated to athlete/artist onboarding and each GNAR is equal to one Gnars DAO governance vote.*

## 🚀 How we'll spend 694.20 ETH

We're a passionate community with domain expertise who know very well the agility required to succeed. Our plans are subject to change and funds will be disbursed through our own proven governance, but this should give you some idea of what to expect:

### Activations

Skateboard production and shipping, existing skate park refurbishments, localised merchandise production, Nouns Vision and Bigshot noggles, fabrication of more giant noggles and so much more.

![](https://i.imgur.com/XQ5qksI.jpg)

*Additional locations where sculpture installation is not allowed will be activated using NFC enabled "⌐◨-◨" beacons that prompt visitors to get involved.* 

![](https://i.imgur.com/2OGWJ1z.jpg)

*This is a rough mockup of small indestructible noggle fixtures that can be glued discreetly at existing spots without degrading an obstacle's user experience.*

### Autonomy

Since inception, our community have had access to Noun 189 in order to participate in Nouns DAO governance. The time has come for Gnars DAO to acquire two Nouns of their own. Enough funds to purchase 2 Nouns will be allocated to auction bidding.

![](https://i.imgur.com/vD0S5Ty.gif)

Additional funds from our ongoing NFT auctions will bolster this funding request, further efforts laid out in this proposal, and allow us to continue onboarding professional team riders who represent us throughout their respective industries as ambassadors.

### Contributors

As required we will provide remuneration through governance to top notch contributors already attracted to Gnars including [Gami](https://twitter.com/0xigami), [Alberto](https://twitter.com/alberto_campora), [Akva](https://twitter.com/Akva556), [Vlad](https://twitter.com/vladhzc), [Sam Mason de Caires](https://twitter.com/sammdec), [Brian](https://twitter.com/pbrianandj), [Rocketman](https://twitter.com/rocketman_w), [Benbodhi](https://twitter.com/benbodhi), [Davin](https://twitter.com/davinoyesigye), [Satori](https://twitter.com/0xSatori), [Lochie](https://twitter.com/lochieaxon) and [Knowhow92](https://twitter.com/theocharis_ch). We will approach these engagements on a competitive basis much like our activations. 

We've been working hard to gain qualitative insight and to establish the most effective operational structure. As a community we have access to unrivalled industry expertise through our relationships with pro athletes, artists, media and brands. We look forward to inspiring many more of our connections through the very same thing that's gotten us to where we are – word of mouth.

> 📝 **NOTE:** Funding receival to [gnars.eth](https://gnars.wtf/), a [gnosis safe](https://gnosis-safe.io/app/eth:0x0658f4eD17289144717713ADfFC2539eF7c2EF8e/settings/owners) multisig [governed by Gnars DAO](https://gnars.house/) members as described in [Proposal 51](https://nouns.wtf/vote/51) with backup signers being [Gami](https://twitter.com/0xigami), [Benbodhi](https://twitter.com/benbodhi), [Oni](https://twitter.com/apenoun), [Noun 22](https://twitter.com/undeadnoun22) and [Blockbird](https://twitter.com/_blockbird).

## 🛹 We're built for onboarding

[I recently asked nouns twitter](https://twitter.com/0xigami/status/1596051642725830656), "what is the biggest problem with nouns dao that needs solving?" I was delighted to receive a response [from 4156 directly](https://twitter.com/punk4156/status/1596061577794330624): 

> "same as every other crypto token imo: distribution. how to onboard maximum number of high quality, aligned etc. participants into the network"

Onboarding is something we take seriously at Gnars and we are uniquely positioned to onboard the next million [proliferatooooors](https://create.zora.co/collections/0x8c5effc5fb5d3805212713115427f4efe82a40be) by staying "extremely nounish" and applying the true grit and perseverance we've learned through our commitment to action sports culture.

### Questions?

Join [our Discord server](https://discord.gg/gnars), subscribe to [gnarly.news](https://gnarly.news/), check out [gnars.com](https://gnars.com), or boardslide into our DMs on Twitter [(@gnars_dao)](https://twitter.com/gnars_dao) or Instagram [(@gnarsdao)](https://www.instagram.com/gnarsdao/). 

Thanks everynoun for taking the time to peruse this funding request.

[Gami](https://twitter.com/0xigami), like origami.

⌐◨-◨

title: This is Nouns — The First Edition minted by Nouns
description:
# This is Nouns — The First Edition minted by Nouns

[![Ordinary Folk Reel](https://i.imgur.com/uSC0HEl.jpg)](https://zora-prod.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/bafybeicnztdctxucbqbpm2m6mghjw6nv4n4opnev4hmftoxk5moykuayeq)
---
Following the overwhelmingly positive response to the Nouns Explainer created by **Ordinary Folk from [Prop 113](https://nouns.wtf/vote/113)**, we are proposing that Nouns releases this video as a timed open edition.

This is a groundbreaking proposal, as it will be the first time that Nouns DAO will be minting and releasing a creative work that was commissioned by the DAO.

By minting this video from the DAO via a proposal, it is becoming NounsDAO canon. Similar to how the DAO added in [new head attributes](https://nouns.wtf/vote/125) via a proposal, Nouns can continue to explore and experiment with new models of CC0 art and production and minting directly from the DAO is a new tool for the organization to directly release and distribute the most important artifacts from the community. It’s not hard to see how this can advance Nouns into a crypto-native form of Movie Studio, Production House, Art Museum and so on.

This video will be released as a Timed Open Edition for a price of 0.05 ETH. This means it will be available for anyone to mint for the specified minting period, which will be open until the Rose Parade on January 2nd, 2023. The proceeds from sale will be split between Nouns (60%) and Ordinary Folk (40%).

We are excited to experiment with DAO NFT releases as an additional value capture mechanism, and potentially create a simple and repeatable model for any creator, community and brand in the ecosystem to put forward amazing artifacts to be minted via Nouns.

This edition will be minted with [Zora](https://zora.co), and will be available to mint onchain and at [thisisnouns.wtf](https://thisisnouns.wtf)

# Release Details:

**Title:** This is Nouns

**Description:** WTF is Nouns? That’s the question we sought to answer in this crazy video – packing in more artistic styles than we’ve ever put into a project before, and a sprinkling of humour along the way.

This is Nouns is the first ever edition mint by NounsDAO, created by Ordinary Folk.

⌐◨-◨ 

**Symbol:** NOUN001

**Edition Type:** Timed Open Edition

**Start date:** December 23rd, 12pm ET 
**End date:** January 2nd, 12pm ET

**Price:** 0.05 ETH

**Split address:**
0xCF8AEFd3E895005C37BB7A901C1a8B253684A012

**Ordinary Folk Address**
0x93629A45bB87C4518cB98Dbd97e016136e89Ce71

**NounsDAO Treasury Address**
0x0BC3807Ec262cB779b38D65b38158acC3bfedE10

---
###### *tranqui.eth (ZORA engineer) is set as collection defaultAdmin to update any potentially issues with metadata + salesConfig upon contract deploy and will then transfer ownership to NounsDAO Treasury Address when finalized.*

title: Nouns Love v1.0 / Mucho Love v1.25
description:
# Nouns Love v1.0 / Mucho Love v1.25

## **tl;dr**
-   Mucho Love is a nounish social impact platform that follows a “see good, do good” format that began operating 6 months ago.
-   Nouns Love aims to be a platform that uses content from social impact, public goods, and charitable efforts to expand Nouns through social media content creation and storytelling.
-   The platform will increase brand equity by building a positive association of the ⌐◧-◧ in a widespread audience.
-   Nouns Love will have international communities in Uganda, Mexico, Germany, and Spain test the framework’s adaptability.
-   Some of the planned activations in the Dominican Republic include cooking 100 children’s dream meals, giving free haircuts and essentials to an entire community, and building a house that got destroyed by Hurricane Fiona.
-   Development of a Nouns Love toolkit, creating a framework that can be used by other communities for smoother activations.
-   The proposal requests funding for a 4-month extension to establish Nouns Love as a fully functional platform and keep growing Mucho Love in the DR for further experimentation.

### What is Mucho Love?


**Mucho Love is a social impact platform that follows a “see good, do good” format.**  
ML uses social impact activations and content creation/distribution to proliferate ⌐◧-◧ .

**It began in Lil Nouns on prop.house** ([https://prop.house/lil-nouns/round-3/655](https://prop.house/lil-nouns/round-3/655)) **and then went on-chain**. ([https://nouns.wtf/vote/137](https://nouns.wtf/vote/137)).

#### In the past 6 months, we have: 

[(click on thumbnail to watch video)![IMAGE ALT TEXT HERE](https://i.vimeocdn.com/video/1561862008-6b0bb7f0c96ea6a1274f8d5a92c6e16018ac271a3dd958c59d0eb896f4a55a91-d?mw=1280&mh=720&q=70)](https://vimeo.com/778240986)



[(click on thumbnail to watch video)![IMAGE ALT TEXT HERE](https://i.vimeocdn.com/video/1561868158-9fbf38c98875938a4a0f09cbdf0e51d1219ed3e43269276bed7e29f33808b89c-d?mw=1500&mh=845&q=70)](https://vimeo.com/778244189)



[(click on thumbnail to watch video)![IMAGE ALT TEXT HERE](https://i.vimeocdn.com/video/1561716804-3360feb04da9e29f78f85da2dc88f4110188ae47a4829b62956a480df34894fd-d?mw=700&mh=1244&q=70)](https://vimeo.com/778159366)

### Problem Statement

Charitable efforts, social impact, and public goods are **cornerstone activities within the Nouns ecosystem**.

NounsDAO **has funded a total of 1468 ETH for 19 proposals** related to charitable efforts/social impact through on-chain, NSFW, and prop.house. *_Data from proposal.wtf_

Public goods are an **essential** part of what Nouns is, not only helping society but making the community feel even more connected with each other. **The desire to help others and make a positive impact on the world**, for many people, is **a way to connect with others and create a sense of community and shared purpose**.

**What are the main problems?**
-   Nouns has yet to have a platform that leverages all of these impacts done by the community, content creation opportunities are not seized.
-   As Nouns keeps growing and more public goods are activated, the need for a flexible framework that produces raw content of charitable efforts, public goods, and donations is a must within the ecosystem.
-   There should be a platform that gathers community members interested in social impact and public goods.

**Social Impact is one of the best ways to show any human what Nouns can do**. The power that **see good, do good** content has is too big to let it go to waste. So far, Nouns has been one of the most successful projects at integrating IRL to web3 impact.

Showing everyone how a community can come together to help others and cooperate with each other, **a community connected by ⌐◨-◨**, is an excellent way to noun-pill newcomers.

This is where _**Nouns Love**_ comes in.

![nounslove](https://i.imgur.com/Zo86psu.png)

### What is Nouns Love?
Nouns Love is born from the interest of the Mucho Love’s team to **develop a global platform that uses content from social impact, public goods, charitable efforts to leverage the expansion of Nouns through social media content creation and storytelling**. Nouns Love will focus on in-real-life impact activations and public goods generated by the Nounish community.

The power that **see good, do good** content has is too big to let it go to waste. So far, Nouns has been one of the most successful projects at integrating IRL to web3 impact.

**Nouns Love will increase brand equity by building a positive association with the brand in a widespread audience**.

![](https://i.imgur.com/4lw5YK7.jpg)

### Transitioning to _Nouns Love_
We will start transitioning from Mucho Love to Nouns Love. Mucho Love will stay as a branch of Nouns Love for further social impact experimentation, public interaction, and testing ground of new ideas in the DR.

**Nouns Love** aims to become a branch of Nouns that focuses on using storytelling, different narratives, and high-quality IRL content creation, which with the **see good, do good** content format **will expand Nouns to a global audience**.

By the end of the 4-month extension Nouns Love aims to be established as a fully functional platform.

![](https://i.imgur.com/5j9RvTb.jpg)

### Mucho Love and international communities
International communities will be using the model created by Mucho Love for its activations to test its adaptability. This will allow to take into account the inherent differences between countries, cultures, societal structures that exist throughout the world.

**The communities that will test the model**:  
◨ Uganda - led by Davin ([https://twitter.com/davinoyesigye](https://twitter.com/davinoyesigye))  
◨ Mexico - led by Mono & Ale ([https://twitter.com/NounsDAOAmigos](https://twitter.com/NounsDAOAmigos))  
◨ Germany - led by bk ([https://twitter.com/0xbk_](https://twitter.com/0xbk_))  
◨ Spain - led by BlakeNeit ([https://twitter.com/blakeneit](https://twitter.com/blakeneit))

**DR activations**:
-   Knife RD x Mucho Love - “We cooked 100 children’s dream meals” ([https://www.instagram.com/kniferd/](https://www.instagram.com/kniferd/))
-   Giving an entire community free hair cuts and essentials
-   @sunsetco.rd x Mucho Love - “We took 10 families to see the beach for the first time” ([https://www.instagram.com/sunsetco.rd/](https://www.instagram.com/sunsetco.rd/))
-   Techo RD x Mucho Love - [https://rd.techo.org/](https://rd.techo.org/) - Building a house for a family that lost it all to Hurricane Fiona
-   Hugo Mendoza Children’s Hospital x Mucho Love ([https://hospitalhugomendoza.gob.do/](https://hospitalhugomendoza.gob.do/))

**International activations**:
-   A refugee dedicated to preserving the endangered Mexican donkey
-   A volunteering event that will hand out food to homeless people around the city.
-   A child care center for orphans and abandoned children to donate clothes, nounish educational materials such as books and pencils, toys, and dry stock food hampers.
-   A city clean-up activation volunteering event.

### Content creation and distribution
**Every public good, social impact, and charitable effort has a unique narrative**. Through storytelling, all of these narrative can portray what it means to be nounish. Nouns Love will have its own in-house marketing team **to develop unique narratives through captivating, “see good, do good” style videos**.

**The amount of raw content that can be produced from public goods, charitable efforts, social impact is immense**. The marketing team will receive raw content to produce high-quality content for social media distribution. The team will have constant brainstorming sessions with international community leads to deeply understand the particular narratives of every activation done.

Content creation was one of the biggest challenges that Mucho Love faced, not having our own team that could develop our ideas, concepts, and styles was a huge limiting factor on our social media content capacity. **NL’s in-house team will allow us to 5x our content creation capabilities**.

![](https://i.imgur.com/ZjHKKHM.jpg)

### Development of a flexible framework
During the past 6 months of activations, Mucho Love has made mistakes, created solutions, and changed formats. The amount of time lost by Mucho Love’s starting inefficiencies is very significant. Time-efficiency is the reason why we decided to develop a flexible framework for public goods, charitable efforts, and social impact.

**A flexible framework that allows for better, smoother activations, therefore saving time.** The framework will take into account many minor details that may be overlooked which can lead to a poor activation and overall experience.

**This framework will be tested by our international communities** that will be performing social impact activations during the following 4 months.

![](https://i.imgur.com/UvXE2KN.png)

### Global synchronous activations
**A global synchronous activation is an activity performed by many different communities that form the Nounish ecosystem in a certain time period**. These activations will target the same issue/activity and produce raw content for content creation.

By providing a platform for people to connect and interact in real time, global synchronous activities **can help to build relationships and foster a sense of belonging among members of a community**.

**Nouns Love aims to portray the amazing work being done by nounish communities all around the world**. With storytelling, content creation, narratives, and marketing allowing Nouns to reach a wide audience.

By removing all barriers of crypto, web3, creating a wallet, discord, different websites, twitter, **see good, do good content** will be able to transcend as far as many hearts it touches in its path. Additionally, global synchronous activities will help build momentum and enthusiasm for a particular cause or issue, driving up engagement and participation within the community.

### Social media & content distribution
**We aim to expand Nouns Love to**:  
◨ Youtube: Mid-length video format striving to combine storytelling with good animations, edits, and clips that will lead to the production of family-friendly, shareable, “see good, do good.” content.  
◨ Tiktok: Short video formats with catchy hooks with the main point of spreading the ⌐◧-◧s through the platform. Making it easier for people who find the ⌐◧-◧s interesting to click the profile and access other social media where more information will be more easily found (Instagram, Youtube).  
◨ Instagram: So far, Instagram has worked for us pretty well. A few flops and one fantastic post (a post with 67,000 likes), but it’s been great in general. Instagram will be the “face” of what NL stands for, does, and activates. We’ll also be using challenge formats to engage more people.  
◨ Twitter: We’ll be using Twitter to make updates like “Today, Nouns Love donated 100 football kits powered by ⌐◧-◧”.

**Combining youtube’s storytelling capabilities through mid-length content that engages viewers, TikTok’s short-form video with hooks that captivate the attention to the noggles, and Instagram as the face of NL, we believe that it’ll be only a matter of time & effort for us to reach substantially good levels in all these platforms**.

![](https://i.imgur.com/a7I8VN1.jpg)

### Budget Breakdown

#### Social Impact Fund 84 ETH

-   5 activations in the Dominican Republic (Mucho Love) (46.5 ETH)
    -   Transportation, uniforms, volunteers activity, and third parties (6.5 ETH)
-   4 pilot activations by international communities (16 ETH)
-   1 synchronous international activation in all 5 countries (15 ETH)

#### Marketing & Content Creation Team 39 ETH
-   Video Editor
-   Social Media Manager
-   Animator/Illustrator
-   Photographer/Videographer

#### 16 ETH
-   Retro-funding compensation for 4 core team members who have worked on Mucho Love for the last four months. (1 E/month per member)

#### 20 ETH
-   Compensation for the now 6 core team members who will continue to work in Nouns Love/Mucho Love for the next four months. (average of 0.83 E/month per member)

#### 32 ETH
-   Retro-funding for necfas, who has worked full time on ML for the last four months, and compensation to work full time for the next four months and hopes to do so for more time to come.

#### **Total Budget**
191 ETH

title: Verbs 6 Month Extension
description:
# Verbs 6 Month Extension

## TLDR

* Asking for the same budget as [our previous 6-month term](https://nouns.wtf/vote/106).
* We have a valuable backlog to tackle [as discussed on Discourse](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/verbs-szn-3-ideas-brainstorm/3189).

## What we've done so far

* Nouns [art contracts upgrade](https://twitter.com/davidbrai/status/1553029502216945665), making art much cheaper to deploy.
* [DAO V2 upgrade](https://nouns.wtf/vote/152), including dynamic quorum and voting gas refund.
* Enabled trustless [proposal payments in USDC](https://twitter.com/davidbrai/status/1598623310094688256)
* Enable trustless proposal USDC streaming payments (audit complete, shipping soon).
* [Ragequit deep research](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1v9oUJQxWfkZxIHhBDQvbyWUy29QMySoUjzM2_X1BrXs/edit) (next up: host debates, run a design signaling vote, build what the DAO wants).
* Designed a [conditional objection period](https://hackmd.io/Ml1kPUePTKS1vBKij_Bm1A#Objection-only-Period), will ship in the next audited DAO version.
* Added a price history feed to Auction House (audit coming soon).

## What's next

We have a [chunky backlog](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/verbs-szn-3-ideas-brainstorm/3189#backlog-2) recently shared with everyone, and we're planning to work on it starting with what seems most urgent/important first. 

At the same time, we're always open to introducing new ideas into our backlog; our north star is working on what's most valuable to the DAO.

The change we're most excited to complete during this extension period is ragequit. In addition to ragequit, we're tracking the following themes:

![Themes & Examples](https://bafkreicd6qlgpghe22d7dbirhot4f3cfxuwkiox2sfjvsmknywpaomqw2i.ipfs.nftstorage.link/)

## Compensation and terms

* 6 month engagement starting Feb 1, 2023.
* Either party can cancel with 1 month advanced notice.
* Payment done via streams controlled by the tech pod.
* $37.5k per person (2) per month (6) paid in USDC.
* 3 ETH per month to Solimander, for time spent meeting with the team, reviewing designs and code, and supporting audits and rollout.
* Total: 450,000 USDC, 18 ETH.

---

For any questions, we're available on the #54-tech-grants channel on the nounish discord.

verbs team ⌐◨-◨

title: Nouns Basketball Court Restoration Project
description:
# Nouns Basketball Court Restoration Project

[![](https://i.imgur.com/8TsoWwe.png)](https://vimeo.com/781383971/f42118965d)

### [slides (via dropbox)](https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/8nojxi0f7kfu4oaqe1lk4/h?dl=0&rlkey=bop3jvo513dxdmrrrnbuttcrx)

![](https://i.imgur.com/sWbnAZ4.png)
![](https://i.imgur.com/k786TOz.png)
